text: Setelah mendarat di bandara Surabaya, kami ke hotel TS suite dengan taksi(www. tssuites. com): dibandingkan dengan hotel yang lain, TS suites mempunyai keuntungan karena berada di daerah sentral kota, areal jalan yang ramai dengan orang lokalnya berjalan kaki, banyak restoran dan kafe, supermarket, billiard, karaoke dan club malam. Tidak memerlukan taksi untuk melalui lalu lintas Surabaya yang sangat heboh!
title: Tinggal di TS Suite Surabaya

text: Kamarnya didesign dengan sangat bagus. Mempunyai pintu geser yang mamisahkan kamar tidur dengan kamar mandi. Sangat bersih dan sangat diperhatikan dengan baik. Receptionnya juga cepat merespon semua permintaan kami untuk perlengkapan kamar mandi, dan pelayanan Massage dalam kamar nilainya bagus untuk uang. Hotel ini letaknya hanya disebelah pusat perbelanjaan yang mempunyai beberapa pilihan makanan yang mengesankan juga. Secara keseluruhan kami menikmatinya dan merekomendasikan hotel ini sebagai tempat untuk menyegarkan diri dari lelahnya perjalanan melintasi kawasan Gunung Bromo.
title: Butik hotel yang bagus

text:
TS has beautiful rooms, excellent service staff  and a convenient location. Right beside a mall with restaurant, supermarket and movies. You will get what your essentials. 

If you are a light sleeper, request for high floor room because at the mall events might be a little noisy. 

By taxi to TP mall is 10 mins. 30mins go Galaxy mall. I personally suggest TP mall as I feel there’s more to shop.

Hope you enjoy your stay at TS if you decided to book after this review.
title: Love TS Suites

text: I love the bed, it is the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in, it is so great that I would love to move the whole thing home! The room is spacious, what stand out the most is the toilet. Great design of "open toilet", raindrop shower is amazing. The customer service is really good and helpful especially the ones by the door. They help you talk to taxi driver and help you with luggage before you get off the taxi! We only stayed for one night but I would have loved to stay a couple more!!! Location-wise, we did not have much time to explore Surabaya and we just took grab everywhere. It is not too centrally located, that is for sure but I think the hotel itself make up for everything!
title: Best bed ever slept in

text:
The prominent room was really spacious - had more than enough room for 3-4 pax. Master bedroom was spacious - had a nice view of the city and luxurious marble bathroom
Highlights -
1. FOC breakfast, massage for 1 pax and transport to the airport and gym (try the classes) - everything was well taken care of
2. Proximity to the mall (rather quiet mall but had some quick food options, movie, karaoke and supermarket)
3. Really comfortable room, it was really luxurious - imagine having 3 TVs in the suite!

Don't forget to try the in-room breakfast where you can choose your breakfast dish and have it sent to your room during breakfast hours - was definitely a highlight!
title: The Prominent suite was amazing

text: Very modern hotel and very clean. Rooms are wonderfull and perfecly design for cocooning and more. At a few meters from the commercial center when you can have a rest, eat and enjoy a pleasant journey with friends. In the spirit of luxurious 5 stars you can meet in the world. We recommand this hotel for welcoming and stay.
title: Nice hotel

text: Perfect location. The hotel is clean and provides you great hospitality. The staffs were very helpful and give the best services. Perfect for family stay if only they have a pool for the kids to play around. Afterall, one of the best staycation experience ever!
title: Excellent ambience. Will definitely come back on next visit.

text: The room is very clean, big, and really good for business trip or holiday trip. Really enjoy staying in here. The location is very strategic because there is so many restaurant, cafe, and mall (ex. Surabaya Town Square, Tunjungan Plaza, and Ciputra World)
title: Holiday Trip

text:
Has everything you expect and want for a short stay. The room was clean and comfortable with a nice design, the staff were also responsive and polite. 

The best perk of the hotel would have to be its location though! It is located near a lot of entertainment spots (malls, etc) and it is relatively closer to the airport compared to other hotels (close to the freeway entrance). 

Overall it's a great value for money!
title: Great stay!

text:
Service is excellence due our family big moment. 
The staffs are helpful, easy to contact. 
Clean and big room. 

Some spot wifi is slow, but its ok because we don't travel for business. 

One of most favorite is this property around entertainment center
title: Love Celebration

text:
I was staying at this hotel during my last 4 days visiting Surabaya. With packed schedule ahead need to find the hotel which need location near the restaurant, cafe, lounge and bar together so I can arrange my all meetings there. Yes, TS Suites has all of it. 

The room was also so comfy and modest. May you can call as boutique hotel. Clean, tidy and we'll arrange. All the things inside the refrigerator are FREE (soft drink, water, pocari and snack bar)

Last but not least, all the services start from doorman, front desk and bellboy was perfect. 

Special credit for Friska and Verina in the front desk who help me arranging when I need transport for my purpose going out of town.
title: Business & Pleasure Hotel

text:
My last visit was the third time I have stayed in this hotel.
I love the spacious room and nice location (next to a medium small where you can find foods and groceries)
But what I love the most is the warmth of their staff, a 5 star hospitality.
title: A hotel with a great hospitality

text:
I came to this hotel for business purposes. I booked for a colleague and surprisingly we got repeater rate. My first hotel that gave a special discount because previously we stayed here. It is located closest to Sutos so you can find food easily. The room's design is nice especially the painting. There is a sliding partition between bathroom and bedroom so you can feel a spacious room. They also offered a city view or mall view and they suggested to choose city view to avoid noisy. For breakfast menu, it was not too delicious. They should improve the taste and it is less variation. You can take all the minibar because it is free. One thing I like from this hotel that all the staff I met remember my name and greet me by my name. I was so hppy and felt like home. 
For rate, it is always more than 1 million rupiah.
title: I like this hotel

text:
Good location attach with a mall, so you don't have to go out to look for a coffee shop, and the timing was convenience as well as most shopping mall close at 10pm, here it will be open until 00:00hrs. Nice touch on the room and the view is nice. But what impressed me the most is the staff.. there were all excellent, polite, friendly, helpful and always smile which give you the hospitality feel.
 Looking forward to come back next time 😎
title: Almost perfect

text: I was first stay for a couple days at TS Suites Hotel. I'm impressed by the service of that hotel. It was fast, nice, friendly, and the employee knowledgeable. I was lost at emergency stairs then they saved me. Excellent service, hospitality, their food. Nice place to stay.
title: Very nice Hotel

text: Very compatible for business trip, near the shopping center. I don't think this hotel suitable for family holiday because there's no swimming pool, no playground or lack of place for children's activities.
title: TS Suites

text:
This is the first time I'm stay in TS Suites Surabaya, the location is in Surabaya Town Square.
I felt comfortable since I went down from car, the greeter, bell boy, front office gave my great experience.
They gave the information very detail and make the customer felt comfortable.
The great experience came along with all my activities in few days. They also texting me to offer assisstant for plane check in .
Nice place to stay.
You also can easily restaurant cafe beside the hotel.
title: Great service

text:
Nice little mall, mostly food court. 
Went to have lunch with friend. There is quite a few nice places there mostly Asian oriented but I manage to find American stile pub thing, called Eclectic. Excellent burgers. Good service but lack of English.
title: Nice little mall, mostly food court.

text: This hotel was nice, neat, clean. Have a good service, and delicious breakfast menu with room service. The room was beautiful and comfy. The facility is complete, it has gym, restaurant, meeting room, ballroom. This hotel also next to mall, it make us easy to find anything, like supermarket to buy some snacks or drinks, we also can hangout with our family and friends there at mall. Like it so much.
title: Strategic Location

text:
The most convenient venue. Hotel with shopping center and entertainment.
The staf is friendly, 
they know what to preferred guests. 
But I don't see the pool, just a fountain I have seen, maybe if there is no have, manajemen must be add the the swiming pool.
title: Super

text: TS Suites is a perfect place to stay in Surabaya..they have large room with lux bathroom, TS Suites is one place with Sutos..some place to hang out in Surabaya and many kulinary..service from hotel staff so nice and frindly too..totally comfort to stay there..and recommended..
title: Nicely Place in Surabaya...

text: Always stay at this hotel, because of the great room design. Open concept toilet, and attached to the popular hangout place. Very convenient to find something to eat and hangout. Service is good, and room service is actually orders from the restaurants attached to the hangout place. No complaints. Will come back to this hotel if I ever come back to Surabaya.
title: Once my second home in Surabaya

text:
Good staff
Good amenities
Good located 
Food are all over the area :-)

Been there with family, and seem the wall were toooo thin, we can hear neighbour doing something inappropriate for my daughter to hear :-((
Maybe avoid Saturday night if you insist to stay here
title: Nice Hotel, but definitely not fav!

text:
This is my maybe 100 nights staying here :) i always use this hotel if i have a business visit in surabaya. Spacious room, smell so good; with a big tub facing the tv is something you are looking for from the room after a long tiring miting a day.

Breakfast is so so, but their location attached to the mall is a great value if you to have good dinner at the mall.

And their service is superb!
title: Will always return. I love this hotel.

text: The hotel located in Surabaya town square (SUTOS) which you can find lots of nice food, bars and shops. Very convenient. We stay in executive room which they just done renovation so the room was nice as they show in famous OTA. Also, staff are nice and helpful. Finally, breakfast are amazing!!! for people who are fan of breakfast will love here!
title: Locate in mall area, clean, friendly staff

amazing breakfast! with some loca food
amazing breakfast! with some loca food

text: Rooms are spacious with large bathrooms. Breakfast in TS Café very standard. Hotel has immediate access to a mall, with a variety of casual dining restaurants. Very standard business hotel with the facilities you would expect. Not particularly special.
title: Standard business hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Jhon N,

Warmest greetings from TS Suites Surabaya.
Thank you for sharing your experience during your visit in TS Suites Hotel Surabaya via Tripadvisor website.

We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with TS Suites Hotel Surabaya.
Our concept is HEEEL (Hip Endless Indulgence Extraordinary Easy Lifestyle) which indeed reflected to our building, services and staffs.

John N, once again we thank you for choosing TS Suites Hotel Surabaya, and we are looking forward to serve you again the next time you are in Surabaya.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I decided to stayed in this hotel for a sweet escape day. To finally have a relaxing day after a stressfull month. And it was amazing! The receptionist was so nice and always put a smiley face :) and the bell-boy was very nice too. As soon as i checked in, he bring me the welcome drink as i wait for my room to be ready.
Then the room.. It was really really niiceee! There are free minibar, an open bath up where you can relaxing in the bath up while watching tv! So great! In the night, i can easily strolling to Sutos through the connecting lobby in the 2nd floor of the hotel.. You can be heading towardly to the heart of Sutos! 
So, if you wanna watch midnight movie at Sutos XXI, no worries, you can always come back through the connecting lobby as late as you want, it always open!
It was a very relaxing experience! I would love to come back again one day! For another sweet escape day perhaps? ;)
title: Aw-mazing!

text: I had a marvelous stay in Surabaya at the TS Suites. Wonderful interiors, very good service from Claudia & Verina. They are super friendly and i would like to thank you to them for the warm welcome. Very reasonably priced too for a luxury hotel. My only qualm was that the breakfast provided is very standard and i hope they will improve the quality.
title: Marvelous Room Design

photos.caption: How to relax after a long day? Bubblebath!
King Size Bed. Super Comfortable. Connecting to Bathroom.

text:
After seeing the minimalist, basic foyer, using a poorly maintained bathroom in reception and a less than impressive check in I had concerns about our stay here.  However they were unfounded.  Rooms are large, beds very comfortable and the showers great.  Wifi is variable and bathroom amenities (in my opinion) poor so bring your own.  Not a fan of multi coloured shower gels, shampoo and conditioner.  Rooms very clean and if you like fizzy drinks there is a free mini bar.

We thought breakfast was good - there was a large selection of western and Asian options.  Let down was the length of time it took to get a coffee and the diluted fruit juices.  They also packed us a delicious boxed breakfast ( plus coffee )when we had to leave early on the last day.

Reception bathroom remained poorly maintained throughout our stay and day reception staff leave a lot to be desired.  Thankfully interactions were minimal.

That said, we loved our room and hence the rating. Hotel is also easily located for restaurants which are a short taxi ride away.
title: Exceeded our expectations

text: All about this hotel was really great !! I love the way the staff talk to you in here, because they are super friendly. The room is really cool ! You can sleep well in here, breakfast was OK. Stay in here with my boyfriend, and both of us enjoy our stay !
title: Hidden Gem in Surabaya !

text:
We chose this hotel for its location, right inside a shopping mall which means easy access to groceries, pubs and restaurants. The room ("suites") are very large, with a comfortable bed, desk, excellent flatscreen tv, and very spacious bathrooms with walk-in shower and large bathtub. The view of the city is stunning. The room comes with a complimentary mini-bar (no alcohol) and room service tends to be quite fast. Wifi is a bit spotty at times. 

Price/quality wise this hotel is a very good choice. We also used the hotel to make arrangements for a car and driver to explore the nearby Majahapit sites and later to travel to Malang via Mount Bromo. All was taken care of in a professional and friendly manner. The car and driver were excellent. We definitely recommend this hotel and its services.
title: Large "Suites", Great Location, Stunning View

text: This is the best hotel ever in Surabaya. I already stay in several hotels in surabaya, but I think this is the best. All the staff in here was very helpfull and friendly. I like the concept in here that connected with mall, so when i have a meeting with my friends i don't need to go outside. I do really enjoy my stay.
title: Best Hotel In Surabaya

text: My first time stay in here and it was superb ! From the front office, room, breakfast and all the staff in here suprisingly amazing with their task to make guest satisfied.. Also in here  was really easy to find restaurant at night because this hotel connected with mall. Surely will come back !!
title: Superb !!!

text:
Spent 2 nights at TS Suites on a business trip to Surabaya.
Nice, clean and comfortable hotel near Surabaya Town Square
30 mins from airport to hotel, room and breakfast are ok.
Try to request for a room not facing the mall if not you will be disturebed by the music and noise happening at night in the pubs near the hotel

Dr E.Chow
title: Clean and comfortable hotel

text: I stay on Ts suites for business purpose for 2 days and felt very satisfied with the service provided. They have friendly & helpful staffs and also good & professional services. I do really enjoy my stay in there. Very recomended place to stay.
title: Business trip

text: I had a pleasant stay here, the staffs are friendly and great. The location is very convenient, located in the business district and directly connected with shopping mall. They also have a spacious room. definitely  going back here again next time!
title: Great hotel!

text: I had an private event in Surabaya and I chose to stay at ts suites Sby. And I'm so happy and satisfied with their service and concept of their room. I enjoyed the free minibar and nice bath tub, the room also has lovely ambience. I will be back at this hotel when i come back to Surabaya  exactly :)
title: I'm so satisfied

text: I stayed in TS Suite Surabaya intentionally for two nights, and can't get enough so i extended for another night. Good price and a very nice place to stay in. They offered free minibar which they restocked the everyday. Awesome costumer service as well. Very recommended stay in Surabaya. Definitely will return.
title: Great hotel and memorable stay

text: I stay for third/fourth in this hotel. Strategic location, just a step for Sutos Mall. I love their room, i always get room with sutos view, love it. Big room...with lovely bathroom. Great AC and strong wifi. The staff so kindness. Their breakfast so superb...yummy...so many choice. Very recommended for couple or family trip. See you...
title: Good hotel

text: The polite and efficient staff make this hotel - they really go the extra mile to make your stay hassle-free. The rooms are clean and comfortable with everything you need. There is no shortage of options for eating (and shopping) with the mall right next door. This is a hotel that I won't forget in a hurry - it's that good.
title: An oasis where you can relax and forget about the real world outside

text:
Comfortable and very good location at a shopping mall with many restaurants
Good selection for food (breakfast), the quality is ok
Free minibar throughout your stay
Service is excellent, very helpful in assisting for transport needs
title: Great hotel to stay, great location

text:
I have many times stay at this hotel. This hotel is located at the middle at Surabaya city, you can reach iconic places of Surabaya easily, for example Jln. Tunjungan. TS Suites hotels its self is also are in placed with Surabaya Town Square mall that you can enjoy with your friend. This hotel is very nice and comfortable place to stay. It have a room that very cozy and big size capacity. The bathroom has bathtub and shower separately. TV channel has a lot channel TV cable and work table is confortable to used. The breakfast has various food, it has western and local food, and every day the menu is changes. For me this hotel is very appropriate when you are have holiday or business travelling when go to Surabaya. But in my opinion, this hotel is to expensive than others similar 4star hotel around Surabaya.
And the last, this hotel has free minibar complimentary that i have stayed :)
title: Nice and comfortable hotel (free minibar hotel that i have stayed)

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This is our third stay at ts suites. Never failed to impress me so far. The main attraction is the location that is sutos area (surabaya townsquare). Great place to hang out, lots of restaurants (local n western food), supermarket, a cinema, teleshop where you can easily buy the line. For those who like to work out, gold's gym is the best place and it is free for hotel guests. For us, room is still excellent from 2012 until 2016 so far. Housekeeping very efficient. Place is also well secured. One thing that surely improved so far is the wifi. Connection much better than before. I am happy to stay here. Lots of good things to say and hope that people who are planning to stay here may experience good things as well.
title: TS Suites never failed to impress me☺

text:
Stayed here for 1 night. Room still good and functional. However i have 2 serious issues with the state of the room:
1. Serious bed linen stain issues. I dont even want to guess what were the stains (note more than 1). Stains were scattered over the linens.. note: many..
2. Cleanliness of housekeeping seems to be poor. Carpets were obviously not vacuumed properly, instead its a just do attitude. The corners, under the phone desks are all full of dusts and other materials seemed to be pushed over by the vacuum. Or maybe just buy better vacuum cleaner??

Other than the two everything else is fine.
title: Good hotel, poor maintenance

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr.Jimmyprosper,

Warmest greetings from TS Suites Surabaya.

Thank you for sharing your experience during your visit in TS Suites Hotel Surabaya via Tripadvisor website.

I have reviewed your comments regarding our room cleanliness and would like to extend our sincere apology to you. Regarding the bed linen condition mentioned is definitely not our standard here in TS Suites Surabaya. We tried to locate this issue through our Manager on Duty log as well but could not find any report regarding this matter, that would allow us to rectify the situation immediately on the spot and perform our recovery to remedy the issue. Your feedback is truly appreciated and please be assured we do not take these issue lightly. I will share your feedback to our respective managers for improvement.

Jimmy, once again please accept our sincere apology. We will ensure that this situation will not happen again in the future and we are looking forward to serve you again the next time you are in Surabaya.

With my best regards,

Sony Widoso
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The hotel is very good for its service, cleanliness, and rooms. What makes it the greatest is the fitness center which just one step away (connected) from the Gold's Gym. The Gold's Gym brand itself assure the fitness enthusiast for quality of its fitness equipment, various fitness programs/classes, and personal trainers.
title: Great Hotel with the greatest fitness center!

text: I found this hotel location is very strategic where it was located in same block of hang out place Sutos.. Many restaurants and coffee shops are available for your choices of lunch and dinner just in walking distance. Beside the hotel room also very nice, big and clean.. The people also very nice and help full... I will back to this hotel when I return to Surabaya...
title: A place to stay and hang out

text:
The hotel is modern and looks brand new. Everything is spacious, well maintained and I was impressed by the very helpful employees, for sure I'll be back there.
Just a pity that there is no swimming pool, would have been great.
title: ^weeks stay

text:
All in all good hotel.  Rooms clean and decent.  Good bed, Check in and Check simple effective and frustration free.  Staff were great. 

Hotel is tagged onto a mall full of restaurants and eateries so never short of variety of food.  Also there is a cinema in the mall. 

Hotel guests get discounts in the eateries and free access to the Gold Gym Express adjoining the hotel. 

Good place
title: Good hotel.  worth staying

text:
I have stayed at TS Suites on several occasions for business and have always enjoyed staying there. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. A large desk also ensures I can work comfortably. In room wi-fi is complimentary as are the soft drinks in the mini bar.

The hotel is connected to Town Square mall with many eateries, a supermarket and a cinema. One can also use the adjoining Gold's Gym Express for a workout. The gym can be busy and noisy due to the local fitness groups.

Staff are polite and friendly.  I was pleasantly surprised some still remember me from my previous stays.

Breakfast is at TS cafe with a mix of western and Indonesian dishes. I particularly like the delicious local sinom and temulawak herbal drinks.

I definitely recommend TS Suites for anyone visiting Surabaya.
title: Always a pleasure to stay here.

text:
My friend stayed here... the hotel is in good location... large bedroom, free mini bar... get 2 cinema ticket for 2 person if stayed at the weekend...

And it connected to food court... which a lot of restaurant that you could choose...

Really nice stayed here...
title: Great Location

text: When i travel i always stay in here, the hotel is very clean and tidy. Stuff is very helpful. Its good that i can brings my friend or family to chit chat in the room. And its located in west surabaya, in a mall sutos. where is it now a popular place to go 😍😍😍😍 i am sure you won't regret. And when i want to have lunch or dinner i just go to downstairs and i can choose a lot of varieties of food. Breakfast is nice. Wonderful exprience!! Will come back again someday! Thanks ts suite surabaya! 😘

photos.caption: The room is very clean and cozy.. Its kids friendly. And located in west of surabaya, I love the

title: Love the interior

text: Very nice place to stay and hangout. Cozy room and confortable bed 😊 Highly recomended. Wifi connection is quick enough and the staff are very friendly and lovely! Yet the pleace has easy access to all the great Restaurants, bars and cinema. Amazing!
title: Holiday

text: The room is big! The amenities are good. There is usage of gym, swimming pool and in-room wi-fi. It was definitely a very pleasant and relaxing stay. No view thou, only busy street outside. And smoker take note. No smoking is permitted inside the room. The bar snacks and drink are complimentary. There something very nice.

text: The hotel was located in a nearby location to the toll road. Love the room. There was a sofa before the TV and I like it very much. There is  a convenience store located within the hotel complex. If it's not enough, there is a mall adjacent to the hotel building. The room was clean complemented with excellent design. Breakfast has a lot of variety with delicious menus and the good thing about it was it can be converted to lunch or dinner, which is nice. The internet speed was okay but could be better. Based on my speedtest on my ipad, the internet clocked 100 kBps download and 50kBps upload, which is not slow either.
title: Strategic location. Near the mall and toll.

text:
- Located at Surabaya Town Square (SUTOS), easy to do bussiness trip at this hotel. easily to have meeting with client

text:

The wifi is good, working desk with amenities, incl coffee/tea and snacks as complementary - I worked late night and felt supported.

The hotel is connected to Surabaya Town Square (Sutos) - good place to hang out, and brought colleagues / clients for light chats and catch ups. So its very convenient, no need to spend time for transportation.

Breakfast is provided with good range of foods.

text:

But it won't change my opinion to this hotel, and it won't be a barrier to me to back here again

"You cn check-out anytime you like, but you can never leave".

text: Stayed here for 2 nights and was booked to this hotel by my Indonesian counterparts. The reception was spic and span and was greeted with a smile. In the evening you can spend good time in the mall attached with the hotel. Look forward to stay again once I visit Surabaya or Bali.

Choices of dinning places are splendid, with all popular dishes easiely available. Price are reasonable. I will come back again for my next Surabaya visit.

The hotel is located at a large shopping mall with plenty to do. Many bars and restaurants.

The ladies at the reception are very helpful and the most beautiful ladies i've seen in Surabaya.
If you're in Surabaya this is the hotel to stay!
Thank you TS Suites for the hospitality and making my stay as pleasant as possible.

text:
We stay for weekend vacation attending a family matrimonial ceremony in Surabaya. We always choose this hotel due to its easy to find any kind of food in the mall. There are many fast food restaurants as well as a foodcourt which sell traditional Surabaya's food. 
Our favorite local food that you could find there are: Tahu Campur (Mixed Tofu), Kupang (small baby clams soup), Sate (satay), Soto Madura (clear chicken broth soup with vegetables), etc., you could also find many drinks and Wedang Ronde (hot ginger breverage with bread crumb, peanut, and kolang kaling). The foodcourt is just accross the mall field inside the hotel's mall.
title: Small, modern hotel with traditional foodcourt nearby

text:
Best place to stay at surabaya.. been here for 3 days,and i feel very comfortable and enjoy my trip.
worth my money so much, the room are very clean and beyond my expectation.
the staff named fryska are very helpful and kind.
gonna back here soon 😊

text: this hotel my 1st choice when i go to surabaya. GRO is very humble, friendly, specially Ms. Anin... Room very Big and clean. connecting with mall, many restaurant and cafe shop. I Recommend this hotel to all of you...
title: Amazing

text: Room is clean, good breakfast. In room, they will give you all softdrinks and chocolate free, which they will fill it up every day. Good service minded and friendly staffs. This hotel is next to shopping mall. which you can go shopping, dining easily.
title: Good maintain hotel

text: Nice to stay there. Next to Surabaya Town Square which is full of restos. Great Gym. Actually next door Gold Gym but hotel members can use through direct access. Price of all OK. Breakfast in the coffee ago ok but rather hot as A/c not strong enough.
title: Nice Room location ok

text: I arrived almost mid night, after check in the hotel, I go to the mall Sutos, which offer all sort of foods and drink. The hotel room is excellent, Clean, modern and mini bar items are all compliment.
title: New hotel with good environment and facility

text:
The hotel is modern, with great design and excellent customer service...clearly the owner or manager has lived abroad and brought back some cool design and ideas.

The hotel has direct access to golds gym which was also nice.

It is part of a nice mall so you can easily eat and wander in the mall.

The only downside is that the mall is extremely noisy so I suggest a good pair of ear plugs...
title: Excellent hotel, great location

text: I had a great stay at the TS Suites Surabaya hotel. It is in a very convenient location, which is beside a shopping mall, but too far from the airport. but its ok. it was really entertaining me bcoz it has a lots of facility such gym,cafe,grocery and all the snack which provide on the room is free, the wifi is great..i love it. The staff are friendly, exceptional, very accomodating and efficient. taxis were easy to get for trips and shopping.Otherwise the hotel is generally nice.
title: comfortable hotel..love it

text:
Very very very satisfying!! The best budget hotel I've ever stayed. The room is very nice, clean, and comfortable. I really love the "secret" bathroom though. LOL. 
The complimentary snack were satisfying, especially for my son. This is a very good hotel for family with children. 
The breakfast was sooooo good. There are so many different kind of food; western, Indonesian, or even Chinese-Indonesian dishes. Everything just good. Very very good.
title: Couldn't ask for more!!!

text:
For the umpteenth time, I have long stay in this hotel.
Overall, I feel comfort and satisfied with the services, cause I have new standard of hotel since I stay in TS for the first time. And if you would fix some services (including Laundry services), I would happily to give an Excellent rating.
I have an unpleasant experience with these services in my last stay in this hotel.
title: Nice Place to stay in Surabaya

photos.caption: Romantic hotel  for stay with family

text: Very satisfying! The location is very strategic, it has lots of facilities (gym, cafe, entertainment, grocery shopping--no swimming pool, sadly). The bed was really comfortable, although my concern was that the bathroom was unlockable. We arrived at 9 o'clock and they gladly let us check in. Maybe it's because there were available rooms but it made me so happy. The meeting room facilities was superb!
title: Leisure or Business or both... Your Choice

text: Staring from the check in process (10 oct) till check out (11 oct) process every single service rendered to the customer by TS Suites is nothing short of pure professionalissm and this is my first time.There is a beautiful staff i think she is from front desk sfaff was joined with me just a couple minutes during my breakfast, ask me about my stay and totally i'm so impressed but i forgot her name friendly and talk easy.I will definitely recommend this hotel hotel to any guest because i was satisfied with thid hotel. The breakfast buffet spread needs improvement as they tend to serve the same food everyday. Under than that i have had no problem with them. Thankyou
title: feel like a home

text:
I went to Surabaya for a business trip and my boss booked this hotel to stay in as the price is very competitive compared to the other hotels suggested by our admin. My first impression of this hotel is good, with its clean cut decoration and efficient yet friendly staff. The room is amazing. Super spacious with a king size bed, a table, and a huge tv. Walk in wardrobe complete with a bath tub, separate shower and WC, and a lovely sink. The only complain that I have is their hair dryer...which was old, and sticky because the rubber around it has melted...yucks!
Breakfast was average, and I found it to have too many local dishes that are more suited as lunch/dinner. Nasi goreng is not an ideal breakfast idea...at least to me. But the food is still reasonable and taste good. 
The hotel is also connected to the TS mall via its lobby level. The mall is big, but unfortunately, I did not have the energy to explore it. Overall experience is a big plus!
title: Good impression of my first visit

text:
Very pleasant weekend stay for the following reasons:

1) Convenience
The location is situated just above Town Square, where the night scene on Saturday night is lively. There are many food choices from local favorites to cafes to international choices. There is also an interesting live band performing on Saturday night, which we can hear from our hotel room on level 3 - we don't mind because we enjoy music.

2) Price
This is really value for money because the room is big, the bed is very big and comfy and the room is new, clean and modern-looking. I especially love the bath tub where i can watch the tv while enjoying my relaxing bath.

3) Pleasant Staff
Staff were all very smiley and helpful, which value added to our pleasant experience. 

4) Complimentary mini bar!
This is the best surprise we had during the trip to find that the mini bar selection is completely complimentary! We love to snack and this is such a treat to us.

Even though we almost gave up this booking due to the lack of swimming pool (Ciputra and Shangri la were our alternatives, with good pool view), we are glad we chose it for the location and vibrant night scene. It will be good if you can add an outdoor swimming pool for guest's pleasure!

I will recommend this to my friends going to Surabaya!
title: Very convenient and modern

text: This hotel is in a center of Surabaya, we can stay in the hotel and go shopping at the shopping mall, enjoy the food in the food court garden of the shopping mall and also available Cinema and music entertainments, the room was clean and good city view, wifi available in the room and the room well designed the lay out for business stay, the bathroom was clean just one point the bath tub directly in front of the door,if move from front door will be much better, but overall i will recommend other people to stay,
title: Combine Stay and Shopping

it is in city center, situated in community mall, pub and restaurants.

text:
Second time at this hotel in a year, so clearly I was very happy to return. It is ideal as a business hotel. Staff are super friendly. Service is prompt and efficient.
Rooms are well appointed with plenty of room and well designed.
Room Service is excellent and do a great job of cleaning and organising each day,
The hotel is in Town Square so there are an abundance of restaurants/cafes to eat at. It is situated about half an hour from Surabaya airport.
If I had to pick on something it would be the soaps/shampoos they are pretty cheap feeling and smelling, but really this Is a non issue on the grand scheme of things.
You will not go wrong if you select this hotel.
title: A Great Choice

text: I really enjoy my stay at TS Suites Surabaya, very convenience location, nice room and great spacious bathroom. Delicious breakfast. Reasonable price. Definitely will book my stay again in the near future
title: Very nice

text:
Located inside SUTOS, TS Suites is located in a highly convenient location. My husband and I were able to meet friends and hang out for dinner and coffee at any time of the day. The rooms were large, clean and modern looking. The bathtub, shower, toilet and sink areas are separated neatly and there is plenty of room to move around. Sheets were clean and hotel also provides bedroom slippers (always a plus point) and complimentary mini-bar snacks. Staff (both at the reception and breakfast cafe) are very friendly, never hesitating to go the extra mile to lend a helping hand if we need anything. Bluebird taxis are also readily available at any time of the day as SUTOS is a popular place for people to hang out. Not to mention, there is also pretty fast free wifi! 

The hairdryer in the room looks old, it can be improved. Breakfast is very generous, but the quality is considered so-so only. The rooms facing the town square can get noisy at night (esp on weekends) where there are live bands playing, so if you are looking for a good night rest, it is better to get a room facing the city instead.
title: Sophisticated, modern room at a fantastic location

text:
Stayed to TS Suites for 4 nights end June. Rooms are large and nice, clean. Staff very friendly. 
Breakfast is acceptable but there us also room for improvements 😀

Mall is just there, coffee shop, restaurants, excellent location.

I will definitely return in here.
title: Excellent hotel

text: Stayed two nights on Business. Very nice rooms, nice location near to Town Square Mall. A happening food and entertainment hot spot in Surabaya which can be reached just from hotels first floor.  Complimentary breakfast was good.
title: Excellent Hotel

text:
We, a family group of 20, stayed at this hotel on May 16, 2015.
I made reservations 2 months before, a total of 10 rooms. I requested 2 sets of connecting rooms, but there seem to be a misunderstanding and they reserved 4 sets of connecting rooms. Although it didn't matter much but it did result in the group being scattered on different floors. That would be the only dissapointment I have of this hotel. 
Apart of that, I was glad that I found a hotel that could be enjoyed by all the family, which consisted of members from age 10 to 84 yrs. The Town Square connected to the hotel is a major plus. It provided a place that had food, standard necessities and entertainment. 
I should add that my mother in law (84) was a bit overwhelmed by the moderness of the hotel. 
Everybody, though was very happy with the complimentary mini bar's drink & snacks.
I even could easily book transport for my daughter that had to go back to the nearby city of Malang.
All in all, I think that TS Suite would be  a primary choice hotel if I come to Surabaya again.
title: Convenient Hotel

text:
Fantastic value for money. Located in Town Square, a happening food and entertainment hot spot in Surabaya.
Lots of eating options just as you step out from the connected entrance to the mall.
Rooms are huge, the bathroom even bigger!
Very friendly and professional staff.
Highly recommended.
title: Very Confortable, Clean and Friendly Place to Stay

text: Stayed 2 nights. Check in was swift and prompt. Room was big indeed and clean but lack luxury with only basic amenities provided. Complimentary breakfast was good with some choices though not extensive. Location was convenient as beside food haven with plenty of choices. Overall was good experience.

text: I enjoyed my fifth stay at TS Suites hotel Surabaya in early June 2015.  I am naturally adventurous with hotel stays, but after staying at two other five star hotels in Surabaya over the past year, I decided to return to TS Suites hotel S its standards are consistently top-notch, and they exceeded my expectations.  The customer service is excellent, rooms are ample and very well furnished, with generous free minibar, a king sized bathtub complete with bath salts.  The Internet speed can be made faster in the rooms though.
title: Superb customer service, fantastic room fittings

text: Very nice hotel in a good location. The best rooms are nice and big and very clean. The bathroom is large enough with a large shower and there is also the bathtub. The staff is friendly, qualified and speak English. In the square outside the lobby you can find shops and food market for all needs and also cafes and restaurants to suit all tastes. In the square, next to the lobby, there is the TS Café, the restaurant of the hotel, the menu offers quite a large selection, the food is very good and prices not high. In the square are often held shows with music and entertainment and the hotel has a nice habit to organize tourist trips very interesting and beautiful.
title: Guest of TS Suites Hotel three months to work

text:
TS Suites Hotel Surabaya has received an excellent reviews from guests who have stayed there as it is a trendy boutique hotel and presenting itself slightly different from the traditional mood of a hotel we are used to stay. TS Suites is located slightly away from the main center of Surabaya city if you take Tunjungan Mall as the center for practical purposes. Anyway Surabaya city is spread out and there will be a need to travel on public transportation as most places of interests and hotels are far apart from each other, unlike when you are in Jakarta where you can stay near to Bundaran and cover most of the activities from there.

TS Suites is very much promoted and it has special rates going on for almost all the time in most applications and they have a special weekend gateway offer which is difficult to resist. It includes breakfast, welcome drink, dinner for one for two consecutive nights, 30 minutes massage in your room for one and cinema tickets for two. Its location is connected directly to a mall known as Surabaya Town Square and known to the locals as SUTOS. If you take a taxi you have to mention SUTOS instead of Surabaya Town Square.

SUTOS is mostly an eating place for all kinds of cafes, pubs and restaurants making it easier to find breakfast, lunch or dinner without having to travel elsewhere. There is a big convenient store and a few outlets for clothing etc. There is live music which can go until past midnight and if you are a light sleeper it is best that you ask a room which does not face the Town Square directly. On occassions, the Town Square will have activities such as exhibitions etc.

The nearest mall within walking distance is the Ciputra World Mall, a mall for most branded items anywhere you can find. The atmosphere is much better here as it is not congested as those malls popular with the locals such as Atom Plaza, JMP, ICT and Pacific Plaza etc. Tunjungan Plaza could be the right comparison but Ciputra World is much more focus on branded items.

The services at TS Suites are really excellent and could be one of the best. Check-in is quick and no hassle and provided with the room as requested. The reception is also manned by lovely and beautiful girls you can find in Indonesia including their TS Cafe. The room is generous in terms of space, the bed and pillows are comfortable enough for a good night sleep, all items in the fridge are complimentary and replenished each day, TV channels is quite a variety, shower bathroom and toilet is separated so two persons can do activities at the same time. Long bath is also available. The bathroom as a whole and the bedroom can always be adjusted with the moveable separation wall and it is up to you to redesign it in the way you like.

There is also airport pick up service provided by the hotel if you need which will cost IDR 280,000 one way. A normal taxi will cost around IDR 150,000 but it is up to you to decide as it is an option normally requested by the guests. There are many other amenities available normally found in any other 4-5 Star Hotel. Early check-in and late check-out will normally be granted without any problem as long as the rooms are available.

Visits to all places of interests and the numerous malls will need a public transportation. The taxi here is reliable and they are honest and used meter. They are easy to get, easy in terms of the fare beginning with IDR 7,000 as you enter and can travel outstation to far away places such as Lapindo and Malang and perhaps to Bromo. The most popular and trusted taxi is Blue Bird but the Orange Taxi in orange colour and the Golden Taxi in green colour are equally as good.

The next time in Surabaya, why not try TS Suites and experience a different service for a change. We will certainly be coming back to TS Suites, no doubt about it. Keep up the excellent work TS Suites!

Saharudin & Mariam
Staying May/June 2015
Reporting 04 June 2015
title: TS Suites Hotel Surabaya - A Nice Change of Hotel

text: This was a business trip.  The Hotel adjoins an enclosed mall area with shops and lots of restaurants so it's very convenient to walk out the door and have many restaurants to choose from and a grocery store. The aircon system has good controls but I had difficultly getting the fan to a low enough setting for sleeping (noisy) and would have to get up several times at night for a drink of water to avoid dehydration.  Internet connection was good but even using the LAN cable it is painfully slow.

title: Lovely

text:
This is my favourite hotel in Surabaya. The location is right next to the Surabaya Town Square mall. The mall itself is not a mall in a traditional sense, more like a collection of restaurants and hangout places rather than a shopping destination.

What I like about the hotel? Modern design, large room with great bathroom. Nicely decorated room, although the room walls need to be repainted since it begins to look worn. Wall-to-wall carpets, which is what I like from a hotel room. Nice staff at the reception, check in was fast although there was a slight mishap on my last stay where the hotel staff gave me wrong room, but they quickly fix this issue.

What I don't like about the hotel? Breakfast should be better. The breakfast is at a restaurant in the mall. While the restaurant itself is a nice 60s American Diner style, but the food selection is not as what you may expected from a luxury hotel, and with a price tag of USD 100 per night, in Surabaya, I would certainly expect better food both in terms of selection and quality for my breakfast. So during my last stay, I skipped breakfast and just went to the restaurants in the mall. Another issue with my last stay was the lack of coordination between the hotel's marketing team and the receptionist. My company has already paid the bill in advance, but when I checked out I was charged for the room again. There must be a missing link in terms of communication. Another issue is with the room. Since the room is quite large, I would say the TV is too small. I think they are using a 32 inch TV, which considering the room is not large enough if you want to watch the TV from your bed.

Would I return to this hotel? Up until now, yes. Location and room comfort are the two main things that I like so I could easily overlook the shortcomings.
title: Great hotel, strategic location, what else can you ask?

text: There is nothing much left to say about this hotel since I am sure that everyone like it as much as I did. Location is perfect since it’s in the mall area, so there are plenty of food choices for dinner. The rooms are perfectly designed and its cleanliness is successfully maintained. One improvement that I can propose for them is to have a better breakfast service. Starts with adding more variety of the menu and more staff to serve us. During breakfast time, I can only found one croissant left (it was 7.00 am) and it turns out, it was a tiny croissant. I also waited for someone to offer me coffee or tea, but ended up drinking orange juice until I finish my breakfast. On my next trip to Surabaya, this hotel will definitely on my preference list but I will get my breakfast somewhere else
title: all nice, but breakfast

text: Visited Surabaya in February for five days and stayed at this wonderful hotel that was connected to a fabulous food mall called City Square or as the Indonesians call it "Sutos"which all taxi drivers know.Large rooms with huge bathroom and open view jacuzzi,comfortable king size beds,free minibar with soft drinks,a can of beer and stout(quite amazed) chips and topped up everyday.House keeping was efficient with daily supply of newspapers and toiletries.The staff are genuinely friendly and helpful and always greeting us smiles.Taxis are easily available anytime since there is a mall beside it and there is great choice of eateries and cafés with some having live music and performances over the weekends.Breakfast was great withs lots of choice,either western,Asian and in one corner all their traditional Surabayan dishes which we always enjoyed most.Going to the main shopping stretch of the city is just a short taxi hop away.Dont miss doing a day tour of Mount Bromo,it's an awesome experience because there is nothing much to see in the city.I am glad I made the decision to stay in TS Suites and I will recommend them to anyone without apprehension if they are traveling to Surabaya .

Plus, when I checked out, after I signed my bill, the receptionist asked me to sign another paper. I asked her what that was, then  she told me it was the guest review form and she iuls fill up for me later. I turned it down because I will not sign the blank review fien without my own inputs. text:
I arrive to TS Suite and checked into a contemporary looking room. The room was spacious & clean with huge bathtub, and the shower was delightful. Just as I requested, the room was facing the food & entertainment outlets but was less noisy due to it being on high floor. If you have a low tolerance for noise, I suggest you request for room facing the other side and away from the square. I managed to buy a local sim card from a shop in the shopping area opposite the hotel. There were plenty of cafes & eateries. It is  a really lively place compared to other areas in Surabaya..
The staff are very friendly, polite and welcoming; always greeting with a smile 
and every request was attended to promptly. From the bellboy, reception, housekeeping, In room dining to the lady who attended  me for in room massage, everyone did a wonderful job.
Thank you.

text:
Very good Hotel - Staff are friendly and very helpful (and attentive). The big plus for me is the location with a large partly covered shopping Mall accessed direct from the Hotel (3rd floor / Lobby), giving you the use of a large number (20 or so) of good quality Restaurants as well as a supermarket etc. 
Rooms are large (although the bath layout with sliding door around it is unique !) Very good WiFi  signal in the room and a good selection of channels on the TV.
All in all a good Quality Hotel perfect for business or leisure (sorry did not try out the gym too busy eating !!)
title: TS suites - Surabaya

text:
On my previous trip I stayed at the Java Paragon whilst that hotel is very good, this hotel was very good but with the added advantage of location.
It is situated in a complex of restaurants so a mere 1 min secure walk and you have an array of places to eat, have a coffee or have a beer.
The hotel itself is well appointed, the room was of good size and the amenities of high quality. I stayed 5 nights and each day upon my return the room was immaculate, housekeeping had even folded my clothes that I had left on the floor to launder later.
The staff were very friendly and always greeted with a smile.
Breakfast was had at TS café, about $8 AUD for a banquet style, with a decent mix of western and Indonesian food. For the price I think it was appropriately appointed.
The price per night is reasonable for Surabaya, you wont be disappointed with this hotel.
I was fortunate enough to read a review prior to my stay informing me to stay on the back side of the hotel and I requested this. I was thankful as there was a music festival on in the square and i'm pretty sure it would have kept me awake had I been on the square side. 
I was woken by fireworks in the night but I expect that is a one off.
title: Excellent Option

text:
I did choose this hotel because this time I didn't want to take taxi for going out dining. Beside is Surabaya town square which offers many restaurants, cafés and bars (sometimes with live music) . Even one night club is there and a supermarket. If the weather allows you can even walk to Ciputra world,  a big shopping mall.
The hotel is nice, checkin uncomplicated but they copy your passport and even want a deposit! 
The rooms are great and comfortable. TV has international programs like HBO. 
The minibar is free. 
Breakfast is Asian style,  but they have croissants, toast, sausages and bacon (beef?!?)  also. The sausages are delicious, which I didn't expect. There is a lot of other indonesian food for breakfast to explore. 
If you want to sleep longer then you must turn on a switch at the room entrance, otherwise a guy will ring a bell to your room at around 8am and ask for clothes for laundry. In rooms facing the town square you hear music from the bars until late night a little bit. So it's not 100% silent, but not noisy either. The other thing: cannot hear any mosque :) 
I would go there again.
title: Great business hotel

text:
One of the better local hotels in Surabaya. It is modern, clean and is part of the SUTOS shopping/restaurant complex with plenty of choices for food and coffee. Also located in the complex is a movie theatre.
Highly recommend this hotel for business travel.
Staff are always friendly, professional and helpful.
Internet connections seem much more stable than other hotels I have stayed in.
Breakfast is good, but not up to the standard of larger International hotels (but well and truly acceptable). 
Gold's Gym is large and modern, but the only thing missing is a swimming pool if that's what you are into.
title: International Business Travel Standard

text: Good design and nice staff. English skills could be better, but in all I still would rate this hotel "Excellent". You can hear at 4:00 am when there is called for prayer which was rather disturbing, but it is hard to blame the hotel and it is part of the culture, so I take that as an experience.
title: Good experience and nice surrounding

text: This was my first experience of staying at TS Suites in Surabaya although I have previously stayed in a number of different Surabaya hotels for business purposes. The rooms are attractive and very comfortable with a very useable timber computer desk, and excellent internet access. The staff are helpful and available for any queries. The Hotel's accessibility to a range of quick coffee options with a variety of cafes in the Town Square plus a supermarket make this a pleasant choice. I will certainly consider using this as a workshop venue in the near future as the business rooms seem well laid out with flexible use of space.
title: Excellent Business Hotel

text: Love their cozy & spacious room design. Room rates is affordable with free minibar...free laundr & free wifi. Easy to access to taxi. Lots of nice restaurant around, cinema, KTV... Friendly & Helpful staffs
title: Nice & Comfort

text:
i like the design, feeling warm and comfortable. the room is clean, staffs are friendly and helpful. 
i woke up late to catch my flight, call the room service and they prepare the breakfast for me to take away. i can enjoy my breakfast before on boarding.
I can easily find nice food at the mall. 
I like the mini bar.... fantastic!!!
title: nice.....

text: Big room... free minibar... nice promo for weekend (free cinema tix), recept serv quite friendly and helpful, located above food mall... missed the breakfast but overall this is a good hotel... they worth the price afterall...
title: Spacious and nice....

text: Stayed with my son for two days in August 2014 and like it so much. The hotel is nicely located, its connecting with the mall center. The room , the bathroom are nice and clean, the breakfast are nice, i more prefer for traditional food.The staff are very friendly and helpfull.

text: I stayed in a suite room and it was like a villa. The rooms where very comfortable with free mini bar and free use of the golds gym situated on the first floor, which I think is amazing. Many eating places on the ground floor as it is a mall, and they have a 24hr bar/restro as well. No more staying at the Sheraton for me, this is the spot.

The cleaness, the hospitality, the hotel facilities, was amazing. Thanks to Suites Hotel, for your continous support in giving the best service to me. 'Will introduce your hotel to some of my colleague, for them to try and experience the facilities and the hospitality of your prestigious hotel.

Prices are definitely reasonable, only disgrunt that i had was that the hair dryer was not cleaned properly, it is covered with gel and hair from the previous guests.

text: I had the pleasure in staying at the TS Suites Surabaya on several of my business trips and found the hotel a sanctuary from the hustle and bustle of a business day.  The rooms are well appointed and I was lucky enough to stay in a room that overlooked the shopping and restaurant area, I was even treated to a free concert that was held mid week and my room overlooked the actual stage. Thought I was being entertained in a corporate box ! Breakfast was plentiful and fresh and the restaurant being open 24hrs was fantastic if late returning from the working day. The hotel is surrounded by a mini shopping mall with excellent restaurants and cafe's so choice is always a challenge. Tried several whilst I was there and enjoyed the meals as well as the friendly staff who were always ready to assist.. Certainly a well worth look if travelling in Surabaya !

text: Stay here for 3 nights. The room is nice, modern design. Never eat the brakfast thogh, cam comment on that. Room rate is quite reasonable. Free minibar. Check out time at 2 PM which great since i have late flight schedule. Connected to Surabaya Town Square, so easy access to a lot of restaurant. The only minus point is no swimming pool which is funny fot a four star hotel. But other than that i would recommend this hotel for business travellers ( I never use swimming pool when Iam on business trip anyway)

text: We spent 2 nights at this hotel and we had a fabulous time. The room was very clean, modern and contained a large bathroom with rain shower and bathtub. The bed was very comfortable. The location of the hotel was also very convenient since it was part of a mall with a lot of eating possibilities. Note that we were invited twice for free dinner at their TS cafe, which was also very good.

text: The room was spaciuos. The soaking tub was perfectly placed, so I can watch TV while enjoying the warm water. The room was clean and the staffs were friendly and helpful. The room is quite big and interestingly, almost half of it is bathroom. The internet connection is very reliable, yet the foods taste mediocre at best. This is ironic as this hotel is surrounded by many eating places. The room rate is a bit pricey, however, it includes sahur (pre-dawn meal during Holy Fasting Month), iftar (breaking the fast meal) and minibar. I have no idea if it is not in the Fasting Month. Overall, this hotel is very practical for travelers; the city is nearby and the shops are within striking distance. What more do you want?

title: love this Hip hotels

text:
The hotel is located right next to the Town Square mall with a supermarket, pharmacies and a lot of restaurants and a few other shops. From the Business centre floor of the hotel, a door connects to the mall. Check out the Malay Village restaurant at the mall.

The hotel lobby looked really cool and very modern. The hotel accommodated our request for early check in and we had a room on the 8th floor. The room is clean, modern and with simple wood finishes. There was a separate shower compartment and a separate WC room. Service was good. The front desk staff spoke English reasonably well. 

The hotel helped to book us on the free city tour. We wanted to check out Pasar Atum, Tunjungan Plaza and Galaxy Mall, and sought their advice as to the distances from the hotel. There are taxis readily available and the staff at the front door helped us communicate with the taxi drivers to tell them where we wanted to go, though some (not all) taxi drivers do speak reasonably good English. We took a 10-min taxi ride to Tunjungan Plaza which is one of the larger malls around the area. There are a lot of different shops and eateries there, but there is enough at Town Square itself, just next to the hotel. 

The hotel provides breakfast for most guests, at the Fish & Co restaurant, part of the Town Square Mall, which connects to the hotel. There was a good variety at breakfast.

Overall a good experience.
title: Wonderful Hotel

text: Actually this is my 2nd time stay at this hotel. This hotel is more like boutique hotel, with Town Square mall in same complex. In this mall, you will find lot of restaurant, cafes, club, supermarket and cinema. The hotel itself fulfilled all my need to get good sleep, good room, and great bathroom. All in fair price. Also, you will get free mini bar and free internet connection. You will need your room card to use the elevator. This is good to provide secure feeling to their guests. I will definitely back to this hotel if i travel to Surabaya again.
title: Recommended Hotel

text:
My partner and I knew this is a hotel that's different from the rest the minute we stepped into the lobby. The decor is modern and contemporary. Check-in was fast and the room is a delight. The king bed was comfortable with lots of pillows. No wardrobe though, you hang your clothes in the bathroom where there is a rail for it. Could do with a few more hangers. We were on the 8th floor and had a good view of the adjacent shopping mall and the residential surroundings of Surabaya. The bathroom wall can be slid open to let maximum light from the windows. The toilet door is completely transparent which we thought can be embarassing when the wall is open. Definitely not for the shy ones.

When we stayed there, there weren't many guests. But we did not find the need to use any of the services as we were happy to stay in the nice room and the fact that it was raining outside so sleeping-in was a convenient choice.

The complimentary breakfast was adequate at the restaurant on the same level as the shopping mall. The mall itself is where the yuppies gather for coffee and meals but dont expect it to compete with the other established malls in town.

Overall, we enjoyed our stay there and would defintely stay there again. Good value.
title: Trendy hotel

text: Unique concept for a hotel, totally different from conventional hotels. Best bed i've ever slept on hotels. Delivery service for food is very convenient. Entertainment at your doorstep. Worth the money spent. Very satisfying.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Artotel TS Suites is located in Surabaya Town Square Mall, which is now empty of malls. With the price we bought and the facilities we got, this hotel can be said to be above our expectations. One of the most minus is that there is no swimming pool.

Entering the lobby, the interior is dominated by dark colors. The good thing is that there is no damp smell to be felt except in the lift. The check-in process was smooth and fast. We were told that cars needed to be registered at the receptionist. Because it was already night straight to the room. The rooms are very spacious. Rooms are equipped with a work desk, work chair and sofa. Small size TV and standard channels. Wifi is also standard. 2 bottles of mineral water and tea using the Lipton brand are provided. Like the standard artotel, they also provide a coffee maker and 2 coffee capsules. We opened the refrigerator and found that it contained something. After we asked the receptionist, it turned out that the contents were free. There are taro, top, floridina, sprite, coca-cola and ABC coffee.

The bathroom is also spacious, equipped with a bathtub. The amenities provided are also standard hotel with 2 towels. Cold water hot water runs smoothly. The biggest minus is that the shower only has a rain shower, and even then there are parts that are damaged so they come out of the shower partition towards the bathtub, while the closet uses an ecowasher. If you want to wipe, it's a bit difficult for those who are not used to using an ecowasher or wiggling their bottoms in an ecowasher. 

Only gym facilities are available at Artotel TS Suites, even that is locked and you have to report to reception to use it.
Breakfast is available from 06.00-10.00. The restaurant is small for indoor but lots of space for outdoor. Unfortunately, there are lots of people smoking outside, so it will be uncomfortable for those who bring babies or small children. The food is quite edible and you can still taste the taste of the food. For food there is fruit:
1. Salad and fruit.
2. Cereal and juice and coffee, bakery, pastry
3. Madura porridge, soup, porridge
4. Fried rice, fried noodles, coconut milk chicken, fried fish
5. Mushrooms, sausage, potatoes
6. Noodle corner, egg corner, waffles and pancakes
title: Pretty good hotel at dead mall

4 stars? You’re dreaming mate!

text: Stay at TS - Sutos Hotels in Surabaya Town Square are very comfortable, because the location is close to a hangout while eating and chatting with friends. The room was clean and unique, because the bathroom seemed to blend into the bedroom, just by sliding the wall. The service from the reception to the restaurant is very friendly and very helpful. The food menu is quite varied both for local and international cuisine available.

text:
Location: very convenient, close to the highway to airport, linked to a shopping mall, near cinema, surrounded by local food joints

Comfort: very luxurious, no pool but business facilities and toiletries are beyond complete 

Service: excellent, very knowledgeable staffs about surrounding and tends to your every request sincerely 

Town Hall shopping mall has world cup screenings, supermarket, leisure ktv, cinema, bars, anything needed is there.
title: AMAZING! SUPERB!

text: During my stay, I stayed in Prominent Suite as I came with family and the suite really suits our needs with two bedrooms and two bathrooms. When I arrived I was told that our room was not ready (at around 12.30 pm). At first I was disappointed, but then after waiting for just 45 minutes, I could say that it was worth the wait. The suite is really comfortable, spacious, and look exactly the same with the gallery pictures. The highlight was the jacuzzi as it offers great in-room relaxation. What I really love is the service provided for us. We were given free 1 hour massage, option for in-room breakfast, complimentary minibar, and free 1 time airport drop off/pick up. We did not use the massage in the end, though. The in-room breakfast came in sufficient portion and choices. The complimentary mini bar was good, although the quantity is quite limited. And the airport drop off was seamless. I thought this was already extraordinary, but then I received a message from Guest Relation that they could also help to check in my flight and print my boarding pass. Although I did not use this service in the end (because I chose to go for online check in), I really think it was thoughtful. The service made up for other less comfortable experience, i.e. slow and unreliable wi-fi connection and very small breakfast buffet room. The staffs are friendly  and sthe hotel was integrated to a mall with plenty F&B choices. I also ordered room service and the food was great value for money. Definitely will stay here again in my next visit to Surabaya.
title: Very good service offset the small details

text: We are currently staying here and are excited and pleasantly surprised with this hotel. It has 10 floors in total, each unit is spacious, interior is beautiful and is suitable for both business travellers and holiday goers. Love the bathtub and complimentary bar, WIFI is fast and stable. It is connected to a mall full of eatery options, a supermarket, and a cinema. Breakfast is served all day (ala carte after 10am), which is great for those who prefer to sleep in. Overall, extremely happy with our stay.
title: Pleasantly surprised

text: stayed in TS Suites for 2 weeks while travelling for work. Surabaya is not very touristy city, but yet very nice to visit. Hotel staff is super friendly and helpful, most of them welcomed me by name after 1st week. Room is huge with nice bath. Breakfast is not luxurious yet very decent; even when I was late for breakfast - they always offered me whatever I wanted with no charge which is nice feature. Located basically in shopping centre which gives access to all the restaurants, bars, night club and cinema.
title: Nice hotel in handy area

text:
We spent our weekend at this hotel. Nice, clean and perfect room and all the snack & soft drink in room is free.. :)
Easy and quick service for check-in and check out process The staff is very friendly and helpful. When we had to print our e-ticket, the reception give us for free.
Very recommended for business trip
title: Nice Business Hotel

text:
Convenient and affordable.
Staff were very helpful and professional.
Suitable place for my business trips. 
Location wise you have plenty of shops nearby and the front desk can help to arrange taxis for you.
title: Cheap, Clean and Convenient

text:
Stayed here again after a couple years.  Cant go wrong here.  Great staff,  clean, comfortable and value for money.  Has a Golds Gym
Next to the hotel so can dive into the gym anytime .  Loads of food options in the town square adjacent.
title: Convenient Clean and comfortable

text: We stayed here one night in the perfect room with bath tub in the room to relax and get a good night sleep before visting Bromo and Ijen. The bed was very comfy and the room one of the best we ever slept in. Very luxurious. Great idea before visiting the volcanos. Friendly staff also. While the room was very 5 star, the room service, breakfast buffet and feel of the TS cafe (different less luxurious style) are not quite at the same level yet. Still very good stay.
title: Great to relax before visiting volcanos

text:
Made a short trip, didn’t actually choose this hotel, but my sister booked it for us. I’m pretty familiar with the are, so I agreed.

Nice place and room, the security and service system is good. They even messaged me about the do not disturb flag on, and asked if it’s okay to clean the room.

My complaint about this place is the traffic. But I suppose it’s not the hotel’s fault at all.

So, here we are. What’s good:

The room (8/10)
A well maintained room, with excellent bathroom. You’d be surprised to notice how many hotels with bad floor draining system in their bathroom. Not this one. TS knew physics and knew how to apply them.

The Crew (9/10)
Excellent crew manner. Nuff said.

Parking (8/10)
They provide free valet, and it’s quick.

What’s annoying:

The Town Square (3/10)
Well, I got a room facing the TS’ atrium. And it’s loud, especially because they have an event going. Okay, I admit this might be subjective, someone may find it entertaining, but that was not in my case.

The Breakfast (4/10)
I was expecting a more range of menu. And better taste of what was served. Not totally bad, but need a lot of improvement.

The Traffic Flow (4/10)
Okay, this is not the hotel’s fault, but customers with personal cars might need extra careful. It’s on a crowded intersection with narrow road, whole traffic is normally very crowded. Extra careful (and extra patience) on weekends.
title: Good Place, Not So Good Food

text:
Good coffee in surabaya at Starbucks Town Square suites surabaya. 

Cappuccino Tall. No sugar. No cream. Healthy drink. Good from fitness like me. 

WiFi ok
Ac ok in TS Suites Surabaya. At Starbucks in here. 
Please try

Had some local food from room service which was simply delicious.Quite a good range of choice in the menu too but strangely was greeted by an utterly hopeless breakfast spread the next morning with simply nothing offered for the non local taste buds or anything worth eating at all. Had to request for an iron and was given a very basic not so effective one from house keeping. The staff could benefit alot from some proper processes put in place and reception staff definitely needs some training on basic etiquette when dealing with clients as they somewhat disengaged and could be considered mildly rude by some. Overall rating poor because there is very good potential for this hotel to do much better and heres hoping this will be taken up by management asap.

text: surabaya is a frantic, noisy, hectic and driven city, however on upper floors of the ts suites, you can relax in space and comfort. So in the evening you have over 20 restaurant and bars to choose from. Although We preferred walking down to a nearby vegetarian Indian restaurant.

The only oddity is the unlock able toilets. And the clear glass WC cubicles. I am an Architect and I appeal to all architects over the world to add practicality to their design. No person would like to see another person relieving him/herself in the loo ! 

Rest the food and breakfast buffet is great. Go for it if you are in Surabaya.

But at night, it was so noisy. Sound proofing didn't work really good.

text:
We booked this hotel a few weeks in advance due to Tripadvisors reviews. And it was a real good choice, especially in terms of the nice rooms and the great location. The staff was polite and helpful. We also benefit from the parking space at the same level as the reception. The rooms were great, I really loved it. With a large sliding door between the bathroom and the bedroom, and an additional shower besides of the bathtub and a separate small toilet. Then the cute table with view to the bed..... just great even if the rooms are not that large (see pictures).
Furthermore the hotel is located in the heart of a kind of shopping center. Actually it is more a restaurant center; less stores for clothes and else and much more different kind of restaurants, partly open air. 
Conclusion: all in all a hotel with great rooms and perfect location (for food). I will for sure stay their again in case I travel to Surabaya.
title: Good location and very nice rooms.... loved it!

photos.caption: View to bathroom from bedroom, with sliding doors

text: A truly amazing experience. The staff are incredible and make you feel very special. Excellent room and it is worth for any penny you have spent. Amazing location. You can go everywhere in Surabaya in short time. Location based on mall so you can reach your favorite place such cafe, restaurant, cinema and club. Definitely the best hotel in Surabaya by far.

text:
I'm originally comes from Surabaya...though most of my families were in Berlin and Wellington South of London UK. Since I have to attend one of my cousin's wedding..so I went back to that city...And stayed at TS Suites Hotel..

Overall it was a lovely 4 stars hotel right in the heart of Surabaya street, where you could find enormous food vendor in front of it. Though it seems might nice...and I have to be honest that I once underestimate the value of their service...But surprisingly it all went all and it came beyond my expectation..

The room is nice, minibar is sweets and free, no manky smokes odor tobacco kind of thing..

I like it there...

ps: the staff (especially women) were all very beautiful..I dont know whether they're  purposely hired some models walking around in lobbies with hotel's uniform or they're actually the hotel's staffs...
title: A help that makes your sleep well

text: This is the first time I stayed in TS hotel Surabaya and I must admit that the hotel is pretty nice for this kind of price. The room is spacious, the wifi is strong, and free drinks in the fridge. The staff are also very friendly. Although the breakfast needs some improvement, but I'm not really a big breakfast guy. Overall, a nice place to stay when I have work to do in this city. Will stay here again next time.

text:
been stay here 2 times, last is on January 2014.
hotel location is on "new city" of Surabaya, a step from mall which offer so many choice of Food, Coffee shop, Ice cream and Pub. there is also theater and supermarket. this is one of main reason why i choose the hotel, its not difficult to get something to eat and if nowhere to go, at least you can enjoy your day by spending your time at this mal.
start from friday night until sunday the mall is very crowded and little bit noisy. you can hear it if you stay at lower floor and choose mall view.

hotel suites is clean and spacious with 2 choice view : Mal or city view.
room amenities is complete, free minibar every day.
the bath room is huge, love it

breakfast have lot variation but the taste is not delicious.
