text:
A great concept offered by TS Suites Surabaya, sits next to Surabaya Town square really made the stay and we feel like we got everything covered, from restaurants, cafe, gym and even a movie theatre XXI. We can hang out in the mall until midnight (surprisingly the cafes still open until midnight!, which is great) without worrying a long way get back to hotel, it's just next door! :)

The room is spacious, nice interior, huge bathtub with sliding door and view through the bedroom to the city. working desk is also well designed without decreasing room space.

Breakfast offered in next door restaurants,  I love the concept of the place. Looked like 1950's American themed restaurant. 

The check-in and check-out process is fast, the hospitality is excellent, beautiful and helpful staff. Great stay! Thank you! :)
title: Hotel next to a mall?

text: very nice hotel.smart thinking & concept of hotel attached with mall. Hotel restaurant in mall and gives a pleasure feeling to sit in mall and having food. staff are really good and co-operative. all staff ready to help the guest at any point of time. rooms are so nice that gives a cool felling to stay inside the room. nice and beautiful front desk. good restaurant with excellent view & location. GRO(Guest Relation officer) are not limited to their office and having continuous observation and review of guest requirement. trust me you will feel to stay in this hotel more and more. if i am visiting Surabaya any time, i am going to stay at this hotel only.

text:
This was my first visit to TS Suites and as a hotel manager I was impressed by the modern decor and functionality of the room. Without heavy and bulky furnishings, the clean lines of the product presents a no nonsense approach to accommodations.

Conveniently located and attached to a Shopping Mall it serves as a great place to stay. Since I was only there 1 night I could not try all of the amenities but breakfast was quite lavish with both western and many Indonesian specialties. This property is about the customer...as you will receive a free minibar in value and their staff are well trained. If I plan a return, I will like to return to TS and stay a little longer.

text:
If you are staying in Surabaya, this is the place to be.
Location is situated right next to the mall, so food courts and just time to spend walking around are right at the door step.
Turn the corner the other way, streets shops and restaurants all the way.
A little salon as well gives you a haircut very cheap, and includes a head massage and wash.
The rooms are very comfortable offering all the amenities and more. Shower is separated from the "sitting room & throne", which is a good thing as far as I am concerned.
Office space provided with connections, cable tv and everything in the fridge is free.
A huge bathtub in the centre, however, does seem out of place but enjoy the leisure of it nonetheless. It feels like its right in the centre of the room between the bathroom and bedroom. But give it a try anyway. Big enough to hold two. ☺
Checkin and out was fast and efficient, staff very attentive and courteous and I would have no second thoughts about staying here again.
The reception area is really comfortable as well, with a nice view out the front to the street. You can have a seat, order a liquid and just chill out here for a while.
My only suggestion to others staying here would be to get rooms not facing the mall. Musical sessions or promotions brings crowds, loud music and flashing lights that are easily picked up in the room.
title: Top notch place to stay.

text:
I booked this hotel on the way to return to singapore. Stayed here for 1 day, but was WOW-ed with the efficient and friendly staff during check-in. The room is having modern layout and large bathroom. All the mini bar items are free of charge. It has beer, coca cola, pocari sweat, kit-kat, peanut and snack.

The room got study table, and easy access to wi-fi. The toilet and bath are separated. The room is well lit, with great view to next door hip shopping mall.

The shopping mall is full of dining establishment from western, local, japanese, vietnamese food. There was also some gadget shops and clothes shops. It has live band during weekend as well.

Nearby you can find a department store, bread store, and batik store.
Breakfast is great, they have local foods as well as western buffets.
There is also gym/fitness center at the next door shopping mall.

The airport drop-off is also available, but at a rather high price. But worth it if you are a foreigner in indonesia, if you know what i mean :).

If i know this hotel at first day, i would extend it for another 1-2 more nights. It is great, near to the city, and happening places.
title: Hotel next to shopping mall and dining places

text:
'A survey carried out by Communication specialist Quadriga, found that around 60% of business travelers considered reliable broadband to be as important as a comfortable bed' 

For a while now I have been reading through hotel reviews in the hope of gleaning something about internet speed, reliability and type of connection wifi or LAN

As many of you will have noticed by now, just because a hotel advertises that they have high speed internet, that really means nothing in terms of the performance of a conference call or live financial feeds to name just two business needs. 

So I have decided to devote my reviews from this point on entirely to 'Hotel Broadband' in different hotels around the world. I will leave it to others to wax lyrical about the wonders of houskeeping or how good the breakfast is, but if you are planning to trade 100K lots on the markets or need a secure and fast line for business calls, my reviews will not let you down!!!!! 

So let's start with TS SUITES-

The Hotel is relatively new and as a result some thought has gone into the laying down of high speed cable. Every room has a LAN line that can be connected to using a standard ethernet cable. Cables are provided by the Hotel. 

For anyone that has been in a position to compare WIFI with LAN: there is no comparison!! A hotel with LAN connections in the rooms almost always TRUMPS a hotel with WIFI connection only. 

For that reason TS suites is pretty much top of the pile in terms of business use and affordability in SURABAYA. 

The hotel has WIFI as well in the public areas which is pretty fast, but I was on a conference call for an hour in the room over LAN and it was STABLE with no interruption or sound degradation. 

The bonus that comes with TS SUITES is that all rooms are fitted with executive style curving  desks and swivel chairs, with plenty of space to arrange your documents and depending on the floor often a beautiful view out over the city. 

The price of a 45m^2 room with everything you need is about 45-55GBP depending on timeof year and websites you use. For 100-115 you can get something really special at the top of the hotel with 130 m^2 

OK I hope this give you an idea of what kind of connectivity the TS SUITES can offer you on your trip to SURABAYA. That was my review.
title: Hotel broadband Reviews

text:
I was in Surabaya again after 20 years, and from researching Tripadvisor I finally decided on using this hotel.

I must say that I am very happy that I stayed here.

Location simply can't be beat. Surabaya Town Square is downstairs where you can find plenty of restaurants and a cinema complex to keep you entertained. Another big mall is 200 metres away if you're inclined to visit.

The room itself is quite luxurious, with a massive bed and spacious showers/tubs. The minibar was included in the price, as is the breakfast.

The breakfast itself consisted of western choices like eggs and sausages (a bit ho-hum to be honest). However, the traditional Indonesian choices like pecel and Indonesian desserts like jenang mutiara and traditional drinks like beras kencur is definitely where you want to be.

The only negative I experienced was that the cafe staff weren't interested in refilling some of the breakfast stations, so if something runs out then that's it.
title: Awesome hotel!

text:
I have been stayed at TS Suites Surabaya for several time and improve a lot of things already. The breakfast menu is more varied and the rooms are beautiful and modern. But unfortunately,  I have got an uncomfortable experience on this visit. 

We arrived at the hotel around 13:15 and we are surprise that only one of the three rooms that we reserved is ready to be occupied, we really wanted our rooms to take a nap after a tiring journey and we have a meeting at the hotel at 15:00.

The reception who handled us is a man with  a quite voice in an easy way offered us to wait in our friends room then he will deliver the other keys,  Whatt???? we were surprised by a strange idea, since room is a private for us. He suppose to be trying to find us another room which was ready.

After a long wait,  I got a room finally at 14.20, he just give the key away without saying sorry since we've waited long enough.

at the next day, i breakfast at the cafe and i had an unpleasant experience again. I asked to the waiter to find me butter since there is no butter on the table and he said that he will get butter for my breads soon. Until I had finished my breakfast i never get the butter, as well as salt and pepper.
title: Waiting too long to get a reserved room.

text:
Stayed there for a night, got a good deal from agoda.
The hotel is just next to Surabaya Town Square, where you can find lots of coffee shops & restaurants. The night I stayed, they had live music which is quite loud, I was afraid it would go on forever but they stop at 11pm, gave me enough time to rest!

The room is spacious and the toilet is quite grand for standard room. Happy with that!

A bit disappointed with the breakfast, came down at 8.30 and they almost ran out of some of the selections, I asked for replenishment but had to wait for long time in the end I gave up and went to one of the cafe next door. 

Location is pretty central, close to zoo and eateries. It took less than half an hour to travel to airport on off peak hour. Very happy with that too!
title: Nice modern hotel next to hang out place

text:
+ close to eatery: restaurant, pubs as in the same complex of Sutos (Surabaya Town Square),
+ Supermarket nearby (Foodmart)
+ Free minibar (only one can of coke, sprite, beer, 2 bottle waters, and kitkat candy bars)
+ comfi beds
+ spacious room and bathroom
+ free wifi but not so fast  just okay

- A bit far from CBD (tunjungan area)
- Strange shower as it is rainshower unless you wash your hair otherwise a very difficult to wash your body without shower cap (I rarely use shower cap except at this hotel for morning shower)
- There was a concert starting around 10 30pm since our room was facing the mall so it's rather noisy. (Pick the room with city view I think it's quieter)
- No pool
- Slow elevators ( Should add one more elevator)
- Agreed with other reviewers about breakfast (lack of variety of menu selection)
title: Awkward Shower

text:
What a great room everything is absolutely perfect. The only thing better than the room is how polite and helpful the staff is. I'm in the hotel industry and cannot recommend it highly enough.
I look forward to a return trip soon.
title: Perfect

text: We stayed there during last Easter break for a few nights. It was ranked no1 on tripadvisor and it turned out great! Location was good. Next to the hotel is a big mall, lots of places to eat. The rooms are very spacious, modern design. Lobby is small. Service was great. Great value for money. Overall, an enjoyable stay, more than expected.
title: Awesome stay

text:
Love this hotel since the very first time i stayed. Spacious room, clean, nice services, free minibar, and i loveee the bathroom so much! This hotel has no swimming pool but it's okay for me since i could swam in those spacious bathtub. I've stayed at this hotel for many times since august 2011. My last stayed was in may 2013. I wish i could stayed at this hotel every time i visit surabaya but it looks like that this is everyone's favorite's hotel since this hotel is very often fully occupied. 
This hotel is in the same area with surabaya town square mall, it makes me easier to find some foods for lunch as well as dinner. If you stay at this hotel on weekend, u'd better choose city view room instead of mall view because the mall is quite noisy at night which makes me difficult to sleep. Place for breakfast is at ts cafe, a cute american-style diner decor restaurant, the food was okay not so special.
title: my favorite place to stay at surabaya

text:
My friend recommended this hotel to me. At first when I heard the hotel's name, I was thinking, what kind of hotel is this? To be honest, I'm not familiar to it's name, but I trust my friend and I am going give it a try.

I was arriving late night with my family and I just want to have short stayed, because early morning in the next day we already have to checked out to go to the airport.

When we arrived, I must say, I was impressed by the design of the lobby. It's a small beautiful lobby with charming hotel staff greeting us. From the lobby,to the room corridor and until we came into the room, it's all beautifully designed. I just love the whole thing especially the layout of the room. It's not standard, they are putting the bathtub facing the bedroom. With it's price, definitely  It's beyond my expectation.The room was clean, comfortable, spacious.

The location was pretty good, It is near the mall so you can searching food for dinner or lunch easily. When I departed to the airport the next day at 6AM, it takes 30 minutes to arrived. 

The breakfast was good, lots of variety, and delicious. we just loved it. Thank you, and we definitely will be back.

The only thing that less was there's no pool for kids to have fun. But other than that, perfect!
title: Surprisingly good!

text: Spending the night for my business trip in surabaya last december. The hotel itself was located side by side with surabaya town square which very lively. The room was very nice with seperate shower and bathtub. Breakfast was decent. Overall its quite nice hotel
title: Quite nice hotel

text:
I always enjoy my stay at TS Suites. The staff are friendly & helpfull, the room was spacious, and the price is also very good compared to the service.
The minibar and internet access is free, and the hotel is next to surabaya townsquare where there are many nice restaurant. it's easy to find food and event at night because some of them are open 24 hr. 
I love the non smoking hotel (they charge a penalty of IDR 1 million if you smoke in the room).
After all it was a good and memorable stay, i would love to recommend this hotel to my friends.
title: Good and memorable stay

text: i like this hotel because this hotel near mall and the room is are visible but i dislike getting to this hotel are difficult to getting this location and the bell keeper are responsible  and l like on services in room i can enjoy all activities  and this are the best place to stay in this hotel
title: Brilliant

text:
This hotel is simply brilliant. They make a conscious effort to leave their guests with a memorable experience. I love it for its value and location. 

The only few negatives are that it does not have a pool but you can get free access to the shopping centre's membership gym. Also, they do not provide ironing boards to press one's business shirts. Lastly, there is no shower head that can be manipulated so some slight hassle when washing up. 

Anyway, I personally would use this hotel again.
title: Absolutely brilliant hotel!

text:
I stayed in this hotel for two days for a business trip. This was a very good choice I made because the hotel room turn out to be very awesome.

For only IDR 730.000/room/night it comes with a very spacious room with unique design escpecially for the bathroom. The bathtub is nice and cozy, enables me to watch TV while enjoying my relaxing time. They also have a separated toilet and shower area in addition of their awesome tub.

The breakfast served in 3 flavor selection which is international, regular asian food and traditional indonesian food. The selection is nice, but the taste is standard.

The location of the hotel is nice for you who seek for efficiency in time. They located in the middle of a mall with a lot of cafe selection. This is though not the right selection for you who seek for surabaya's traditional food experience sice the cafe usually served western food.

Overall this hptel gives me a very comfortable experience. Keep up the good work guys !!
title: Premium hotel with a very reasonable price

text:
One of my personal favorite surabaya city.  Great very cozy room,  nice bathroom arrangement, gray view to the city (if you get the city view above 5 level.  Best at 10).

Everything ingots hotel is well design and maintained. And its so very easy to look for a coffee shop or a hangout place just a lift away.  Because it's located in one of the mall / town square filed with so many cafe and hangouts plus cinema and karaoke. 

To go around the city is also quite easy since the location is easy access from most of surabaya parts. 

Personal recommendation.
title: Great room great location

text: Have been to some hotels in Surabaya, but this is certainly the best hotels I have ever stayed up to now. The room is cozy and spacious (the free minibar is also great), and the price is quite affordable for the quality it provides.
title: Modern spacious room for an affordable price

text:
Like cafe inside the hotel, so many place for us to looking for some food. Ts Hotel and Surabaya Town Square was built in one location. 
Breakfast is average in taste n choice, no something special. But feel nice to stay here, if u don't have much time to go some place to dinner because u want to take a rest soon.
If u stay in this hotel, they will give u compliment (snack, softdrink n 1 can of guiness beer).
title: Do u want to looking for some food in ur hotel? Come and enjoyed

text:
I would rate it as a good 4-star hotel. The room is clean & the mini bar items are all free, which is really good (there's like 3 soft drinks, a beer, 2 kit kats & 2 small pack of snacks)

Although it's a pretty good hotel, I am disappointed by a few things though.

1st: I send them a couple of emails & day tour enquiry, but their replies are often a few days late & worst is, no reply at all to my last email regarding confirmation of pick-up.

2nd, the hot water for the bath tub is luke warm, despite turning just the hot water tap.

3rd, the breakfast selections can be better. The cafe looks good but the food doesn't.

There's room for improvement.
title: A good 4-star hotel

text: Have stayed here many times before. My preferred choice in Surabaya. I like the convenient location of it being attached to a mall with lots of eateries and a night spot. Service remains great as expected and consistent over the years. Very fast and efficient checking-in and checking-out. Very NON - SMOKERS friendly. Spacious room with free WIFI, nice-sized TV and complimentary mini-bar (peanuts, kit kat x2, guinness can, coke, sprite & pocari). Comes with a nice-sized "open-plan" bathroom (sliding doors for privacy if needed). Breakfast is pretty basic but adequate. Will be back here next week.
title: Great Business Hotel

text: The location of the hotel is connected with sutos mall area, which is good if you want to shop or find some food around, but in the weekend could be noisy because of the band stand in the food court even from my room, I can see the band performance upside. The hotel staff are great, nice service and also fast. The desain of the room was magnificent, large bathroom with bath tube. Now the hotel also have golds gym service.
title: Best bussiness hotel

text: Hotel services are great in overall from check-in to check-out. It was one of our company favo's hotel to stay for several years already. Its connection to Surabaya Town Square, is providing another good experiences for local or overseas travellers to try many local food or international food. Access to highway is not that far which providing easy access to go everywhere and reaching airport shortly. For business purposes, internet connection (wifi) is one of important things need to be available and it's no problem so far during stay in this hotel.
title: Complete Package

text: This is my third time staying here and I must say, the quality and service remains consistent. As soon as you enter to check in, the staff makes you feel welcome and the first impression is a lasting impression. The rooms are spot on and very clean with a cool design, flat screen TV and very comfortable bed. The breakfast is good if you enjoy local Indonesian breakfast, as for Western it passes but comparable to any other Western five star hotel I've stayed at in Surabaya. All and all, the best hotel I've stayed in in Surabaya by a long shot. Well managed and after the Sheraton or Shangri-la which is double the price for tired rooms, this place rocks. My only suggestion is that it would be nice if there were a few drawers under where you place your suitcase to put your clothes in.
title: Consistant Quality

text: I knew this hotel from a travelling mailinglist group and from tripadvisor. The room rate is affordable while the room itself is very nice and convenience. Its spacious, clean, with a convenience bed and lovely city view. The bathtub next to the bed enable us to supervise our son having his bath  in the bathtub while we watched the television. The hotel's staff were helpful and provide a prompt response whenever we need their assistance. The breakfast was good and they serve tradisional and hawker food such as pecel, gado-gado and gorengan. The hotel is located in Surabaya Town Square where there are so many restaurants that we can choose for dinner. Over all, we love the hotel and certainly will come back if we visit Surabaya.
title: Love it

text:
I stayed about 3 times in this hotel since last year. I visit Surabaya about once or twice a year with my husband to meet up with our friends and family.
TS Suites is our best stay in Surabaya, as my husband loves to go golf around there at Bukit Darmo Golf and Citraland.
While I like to meet up with my high-school and university friends.
TS Suites make it easy for me to decide where to hang out as it's located just above Sutos, one of the best hang out place in Surabaya.
The service staffs very helpful and the check in and out so easy and fast. 
Breakfast was good too, all the restaurant at Sutos also very nice, I love the Kampoeng which offers all sort of local Surabaya delicacies.

Tips on choosing room: if you are an early bird, means you wake up and sleep early like us, choose those room with the city view, as those with Sutos view are nice but can be very noisy at night especially weekends. Sometimes they host life band with super sound system.
title: Great location and service

text:
We spent 2 nights in TS Suites and had a really comfortable and great stay. It is not a big hotel and does not have any pool. But it makes up for its stylish and spacious rooms. It is above the Town Square Mall, not a big shopping centre but there are many restaurants. There are also many tv channels to choose from if you are a tv buff. They have recently opened their gym and guests get to enter at no charge. Plus their mini bar is free! 

Customer service wise, not all staff were as friendly as the others. But their standard is still acceptable. Breakfast spread is sufficient but some guests may find them limited as there are not many choices. As a family, we found it alright. 

At night, the music from the restaurants below may be disturbing if you do not like noises and turn in early. Note to family, there are not much activities for the children here but if they enjoy playing in the tub, then the spacious room may bring them joy as well.
title: Love the room!

text: Every month since April 2012 on my business trips I mostly stay at TS Suites. The location is near business disctrict of West Surabaya. The Receptionist are very helpfull. Hotel rooms are spacious. Environment full of my favorite culinary.
title: Nice Hotel in Surabaya

text:
I spent 4 nights in the TS Suites Hotel in Surabaya. The rooms are spacious and well equipped. The staff superb kind (w/o exceptation). My only concern the cleanliness of the room, but still acceptable. I loved the numerous english televison programmes with HBO and other movie channels. In addition the hotel is a part of a modern mall with all kind of international restaurants.
If you are planning to visit Surabaya the TS Suites is a good choice.
title: Nice place in Surabaya

text: This hotel has a very good service, It is my first stay and I'm already quite impress with the services offered. I booked through Agoda because I saw it is number ONE in trip advisor. During my stay, I could say that the overall quality of the products are fullfiled my expectation.
title: Impressive service beyond expectation

text:
Its my very first stay at TS Suites and I am very impressed with the service and room.
Unfortunately, I checked in late and had to leave early the very next morning to catch a flight back to Jakarta. Hence, there was no opportunity for me to explore the hotel further except the room which I stayed in.
The room was excellent with full amenities. Mini bar was FREE!
Usually I do not sleep well in an unfamiliar environment but I slept like a baby that nght.
Will definitely return to stay when in Surabaya again.
title: Will be back!

text: I stay in ts hotel  a couple time, it's a very good hotel, with a friendly and helpful staff. The location is great, the room is clean, the food is good. I really hope the ts hotel will give a member card
title: the hotel I suggest in surabaya

text: No complaint about the room and services as everything was up to your expectation.  This hotel is nearly perfect except their breakfast offering.  The variety of foods and drinks for breakfast are very standard and hoping they could take this seriously and improve to stay ahead of competition.
title: Nearly perfect except...

text:
Because my job nature, every month I have to travel to Sub for biztrip. And every time in Sub I only stay at 2hotels; SS and this hotel. This is not an official 5* hotel but their product, service, people is beyond other 5* hotel.

Product: Room is very very good and modern. I can't find other hotel which has at least the same room layout like this even 5* hotel. Breakfast is improved though from the old time.
Price is also win factor, lower then 5* but you get much more than you pay

If you can afford, you have to try their Suite; Promenade and CEO. Very often I stay at their suites and compare with other solid 5* hotel suites, their suites is very very good.

Location also very convenient, attached to Sutos, open air mall full of rest and entertainments.

The team is also very good, from beginning to the end you will be served with one of the best hospitality team in Sub. 

The minus factor is the lack of pool so I think this hotel is more suitable for biztrip and couple.

very very recommended hotel indeed...
title: Excellent as Usual

text: The room, the services and the food was excellent. The location is exactly on the same spot with Surabaya Town Square, so you can just hangout and relax with your friend at one of those bars and restaurants anytime you want :)

text: Friendly welcoming staff. Fantastic modern rooms with great bathroom. Nice breakfast buffet at the TS coffee house. Conveniently located in a shopping mall with plenty of nice and good restaurants. This hotel has all the amenities to be a great place to stay would it not be that:  We stayed there on a weekend night when in the shopping mall below they perform open air rock concerts till 1.30 a.m. and then till 2.30 a.m. pounding disco music. The walls of the rooms are made of paper so catching any sleep will be difficult. When talking people are passing in the corridor it sounds like the pass near your bed. As we had to wake up early we contacted front desk around midnight if we could not get a room at the other side of the hotel to catch any sleep. This was only possible if we packed all our luggage and moved them to the new room too. We where not in the mood to first do a total packing and move everything to the other room to be awake completely again after doing this. At check out we asked if any compensation was possible for this bad night but this was laughed away with a nice Asian “I don’t want to understand you” smile. What could have been and started as a nice experience unfortunately ended up as a bad experience. Pity…
title: Bad night

owner_response.text:
Dear Bruno,

Warmest greetings from TS Suites Hotel Surabaya.

Allow me to express our deepest apology for the inconvenience that you have to suffer during your stay with us. 

We are attached to Surabaya Townsquare, and sometimes there are music event held at the mall area. To avoid disturbance during such event, we would suggest our guests that need good quality sleep to be placed in city view side of the hotel, not facing the mall. In your case, I understand that you have been offered such alternative, but you refused to be moved.
Of course this is not your fault, and we understand that our wall is somewhat not sound proof. We are doing some improvement in this area.
Your suggestive feedback is highly appreciated, please rest assure that we will take some action to always improve our services and facilities.

Thank you for your input and also for staying with us, we hope to serve you again in the near future, with better and improved services.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed here for 2 nights for business trip and it was the best stay i've ever had in Surabaya.

Got there around noon, my room wasn't ready so i have to wait first. But it's not a problem since the hotel is located right next to Surabaya Town Square that offers a great amount of restaurants, so i could have lunch while waiting.

Once checked in, i was really surprised to see the room! I was expecting a regular hotel room, since this hotel's price is somewhat standard, but man, how wrong i was! It is so modern, comfortable, and excellent in any way. I especially love the bath room. The bath tub is so well positioned that it could allows you to watch the tv from the bath tub! (which is really a plus point for me -- i'm childish that way) 

The breakfast is served in the restaurant in SuTos area, and they serve quite good variety of foods. Free minibar in the room also!
The hotel also provided full access to Golds gym in SuTos. The non-smoking environment in the hotel was also a plus side for me, but don't worry for you smokers, smoking is still allowed in nearby SuTos area, so it's not a problem really.

Staffs were great and very helpful, location is also really good. Overall, it is an excellent stay and i definitely will be back to TS Suites!

P.S. Make sure you book early, since (i heard that) it mostly fully booked throughout the year --  they didn't have lots of rooms.
title: Excellent stay in Surabaya

text:
Booked the premium suite in TS Suites Hotel for a 3 nights stay with my partner while in Surabaya. For the price we've paid, I'd say that it is really value for money and I was indeed pleased with the service, given my high expectations prior to departure and after all, it is ranked number 1 in TripAdvisor. 

Check In/Check Out:
It was a fast and efficient check in upon reaching the hotel at around 4pm.

Location: 
I like the fact that the hotel is connected to a shopping complex - Surabaya Town Square whereby it is easy and convenient for me to access the varieties of food options, shopping as well as purchasing of necessities without having to take the trouble to hail a cab. The only drawback to its strategic location for travelers who decide to turn in early for the night will probably be that since the music performance lasted till ten at night, it could be quite a disturbance especially for light sleepers.

Rooms: 
I was pleasantly surprised when I first checked into my room because it was definitely way higher than what I've expected. The exterior of the hotel does not really do justice to its 5* room standard. The room was spacious and comfortable, designed in a modern, minimalist and ergonomic hue. I like the concept of the room as it actually allows guests to watch TV while soaking in the bathtub with a panoramic view of the city. Complimentary fully-stocked minibar and amenities were also replenished regularly everyday. Most importantly, the room is clean which I am very particular of. 

Complimentary WIFI provided for the hotel is definitely a plus especially since the hotel industry is a highly competitive market, hotels will definitely need to bundle their products/services in order to compete. 

Facilities:
There are no in-house swimming pool in the hotel proximity so it may be a disappointment for guests who are hoping to have a dip in the pool. In my subjective opinion, the complimentary breakfast at the cafe definitely have rooms for improvement. Several breakfast items were apparently cold on some occasions when the serving dishes that display the food were left open. Service staffs on shift could have been more alert in this area so as to avoid the food being exposed in the open air for too long. 

Verdict:
Asides from the buffet breakfast, I thought that TS Suites Hotel is doing good amongst the different aspects and components ranging from room standard, service to its strategic location. However, in order for the property to compete in the highly competitive hotel industry, it will be of paramount importance to constantly review their operational strategies in every aspect to maintain its competitiveness. It was a pleasant stay and hopefully the hotel will make improvements in the F&B aspect in my future stay!
title: One of the Best in Surabaya!

owner_response.text:
Dear j_herliani,

Warmest greetings from Hotel TS Suites Surabaya.

text: I stayed in this hotel couple of times since it first opened couple years ago. The only reason I want to stay here is the hotel's rate, pretty cheap compare to others. Some of the staffs are not friendly nor helpful. The room is okay if you get the Premium suites, while the Executive suites is so so. The breakfast is pretty awful but anyway this hotel share the same building with Surabaya Town Square where you can find some nice restaurants and they have promotion, 50% discount on lunch almost in all resto during weekdays, 11am-3pm. Last time I stayed there, Surabaya was so hot, and too bad this hotel doesn't have a pool. I don't like the bath amenities also. Free minibar in the room.
title: Shouldn't be number 1!

owner_response.text:
Dear Susan Pradja,

Warmest Greetings from Hotel TS Suites Surabaya.

I would like to express our gratitude for your review towards our hotel in Trip Advisor.

We tried to search for your details in our database, and we found only one stay under your name, which is on January 1st 2009. Please advise if you actually have more stays with us, under different name registered in our system. Using your data in our hotel database, we tried to contact you on your number, but it appears that your number is no longer active.

Reading your review, I understand that you were not satisfied with our services, and for this please accept our most sincere apology. 

At the time of your stay, we were a newly opened hotel, and I am sure there were a lot of works needed to be done to ensure our guest’s satisfaction. It’s been four years from that time; I believe that we have done a lot of evolution in many fields regarding our staffs, services and facilities. Such as, we are now serving breakfast in our very own restaurant TS Café, and most of our frequent guests recognize the improvement in food & service quality, as you can read in some guest’s review on Trip Advisor.

Regarding the facilities that did not meet your satisfaction, is there a chance that this is related to your personal point of view or standard? As you can also read in previous comments on Trip Advisor, most of our guests have no problem with things such as bath amenities. 

And about the rate, I must say we are not cheap or low rated hotel, we are value for money hotel. For similar hotels around Surabaya, our rates are still high as you can compare on online booking sites e.g Agoda or booking.com. But for the value of the money, we offer more than other hotels in term of services and facilities.

At this opportunity I would like to invite you to stay with us again, and experience the endless indulgence we always preserve to our guest. We believe this is the reason why our guests put us on number one, here on Trip Advisor. Hopefully, you will be most pleased with your next stay with us. 

Thank you for staying with us, and we are looking forward to serve you again, surely with better services.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: View from our room to the Sutos

text:
Hi,

It's all worth it. Drive in with valet parking available complimentary for guest, welcome drinks and checking in hotel took less than 10mins. Ambient : business hotel as it is located centrally in Surabaya. Room was awesome. Stayed in room 612 recently facing the city, requested in advance via email as well as twin bed. Down side: booked premium room but given standard room as premium room does not have twin bed. 

Linda @ service counter was very helpful with direction to a restaurant that I need to go.

Overall: impressive, I will definetly be back.
Suggestion: shuttle service within few KM's
title: 5* hotel

text:
I stayed here three times with one of my relative and never got bored of the ambiance. It's clean, modern and simple yet grand. The bed is very comfortable and the bathroom is quite big. The main bathroom with bathtub and wash basin, and there were separated toilet and also shower booth. Amenities are complete and tidily arranged.  
 
Although I must recommend to ask for the room with city view instead of mall view, because usually on weekends the live music in the mall are too loud you can hear it from your room. Not only live music but the disturbance came also from big motorbikes who hangs out and blare their mufflers every weekend. Usually you will suffer until midnight and then it will subside. Weekdays stay is okay.

One thing i like the most about TS suites, you won't be having a regular breakfast buffet, rather the buffet of Fish 'n Co. (then) or TRS (now). Location is relatively close from Surabaya Shopping Malls like Sutos, Ciputra World, PTC, TP etc. Very ideal for business trip.
title: Sleep in Style

text: modern atmosphere will instantly welcome you when entering the lobby. it is located on surabaya town square, one of hang out destinations for surabaya people. it has unique room arrangement where the bathroom is only separated with sliding doors to the bed room, so you can still watch tv while bathing :D my baby loves the bath tub so much that she even played pick a boo there. the room was clean, the amenities are complete and the minibar is free! what a service, no? the staffs are all friendly, good reservation and good housekeeping. the price is quite premium, but the service is good. it was a satisfying experience that i definitely will come back for another trip.

text:
I booked this hotel because of the ranking in the tripadvisor. Today, i prove why this hotel get rank #1 of 50 hotels in Surabaya. The check in process was very efficient and they provide free valet parking. Those 2 things were very very important for our family because we just had long journey from central Java. Having quick check in and valet parking allows us to take a rest as soon as we want it. 

We were staying in executive room which is the standard room for this hotel but the room is spacious with modern touch. I like the bathtub design and the lay out of the room. While you are soaking in the bathtub you could watch the tv as well as the city view (if you are at the higher floor)

The minibar is free and i found warm greeting letter from the GM with my name on it. They also gave 3 pieces of ferrero rocher chocolate. What a very pleasant surprise.

Location is also superb. It is Close to Darmo and wonokromo exit toll gate which gives easy acces for people arrived  to Surabaya with their car. It also has easy acces to Town Square Mall.

The only downside is we could hear the band playing at the mall even we stayed in the 10th floor. But it was finished before 9 pm, so it doesn't really bother us.
title: Luxury at affordable price

text: Excellent hotel and location. We arrived at the hotel almost midnight. First impression of the hotel,it was really quiet and there was a male receptionist at the time. The check in was really efficient and fast as the hotel has prepared my details earlier. As we entered our room on the 5th floor, i was really shocked with excitement because, the room was perfect and fantastic! It was really nice to see a warm welcoming letter with my name written on it already with some chocolates. I didnt go to sleep right away cause i was really excited. The minibar is a complimentary from the hotel. The housekeeping will top up the minibar once they make up the room. The hotel smells good all the time. My room is a premium suite with a nice n big bathtub which i always enjoyed when using it. The hotel is located at townsquare sutos which is surrounded with cafes n restaurants, supermarket n other shops. It is also close to ciputra world mall. I have no complaints but i just hope that the hotel will maintain or even better,upgrade the standard and facilites. In the future, i would definitely stay in this hotel again. Well done!

text:
I stayed at TS Suites in Surabaya during my last business trip. The hotel is a gem for the room rate that you pay for your stay. The staff is very helpful and everyone can speak very good English. Check-in is a breeze and you are greeted with a cold face towel and a juice or tea while you wait to be processed. The room is large with modern furniture. What I like about the room is the Japanese style wall meaning the wall that divides the sleeping quarters and the bathroom can slide giving a much roomier feeling. And because of that you can watch the TV while taking a bath or doing your business in the bathroom.
Internet connection is free (a must for business travelers) along with free WiFi. There is a small fridge that contains an 8 oz Guinesss beer (yes!!) along with an assortment of juice and sodas. The best part about it - it's all complimentary. Breakfast, buffet style, is also complimentary.
The bed is firm yet comfortable which is easy on my back. The linens and pillows are soft and clean. 
I feel the place is very secure even though it's located next to a shopping area. Access to the room via the elevator can only be done with a room key. 
I am looking forward to staying at this hotel on my next business trip.
P.S. - the front desk manager is so nice. She wants to make sure your stay is as pleasant as possible.
I don't believe in giving 5-stars, otherwise there will be no more room for improvement.
title: Surabaya Gem

text:
This is our 4th trip to Surabaya and our choice of hotel has always been Sheraton. However this time, we decided to give TS Suites a try, for a change. We booked 4 rooms for our group. And boy, we were blown away by the amenities and the service! Firstly, the walkway smell nice. The room is huge and the bathrooms is even humonguos! We couldn't find fault with any! Perhaps this is due to the hotel being new so everything is nice! We find the breakfast spread not that bad too, we love it! Again, we must stress here, the service is GREAT from the reception to the porters to the bell boy to the security! The mall link to it, Sutos, has a wide variety of restaurants and also a cinema. Only thing is that, there is no anchor tenant like Matahari or Hypermart or Carrefour here, otherwise, its perfect. Anyway there is a huge 24 hour KFC just opposite so no worries abt getting hungry in the wee hours. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay here!
As for taxis, it is not difficult to get a bluebird here. Just ask the hotel staff and they will hail 1 for you.
title: Lovely hotel

text:
- Stayed in this hotel from 9/6-11/6. I agreed with "Bigbuddy66" that the staff and room are on good quality and friendly. Free Wifi (which nowadays most hotel is offering, only those want to left behind will not offer) and free mini bar are an added advantage. No swimming pool. Not really a gim room, to me it's more like a walkway with some exercise machines. Limited variety for Breakfast. This is a "Non smoking" hotel, those caught smoking in room will be fined 1juta Rupiah (according to the receptionist). 2 mini singing performance were held on 9/6 night (1 looks more like idol type with judges sitting in front). Occasionally playing rock and heavy metal music - might be a nightmare for those who needed early rest or prefer quiet night. Not sure why "steven888Malaysia" commented "great sounds proof window"...

- Sutos is a good place with many choices of restaurants, pub, cafe...good for meeting, chit-chat and hang-out. There is supermarket within selling groceries, vegetables, fruits, breads, etc - convenience.

text: This is a solid 4 star boutique hotel.  The staff were very friendly and always smiling. The room was very nice and the studio/suite bathroom thing was very interesting. The free wifi and minibar were good.  The problem I had was not really a fault of the hotel. Just outside is Sutos, a medium sized outdoor/covered mall with list of restaurants and bars and a few stores.   Apparently there was some type of band competition mixed with the Euro soccer tournament which results in loud thumps from the woofers and roars from the football crowd into the wee hours of the morning.  I didn't get a good night's sleep during my 3 day stay though the bed was very comfortable.  I would reccomend to the owners to put double pane glass on that side of the hotel.  It may not eliminate all noise but it certainly couldn't hurt.  All in all, it's not a bad place for the price.
title: Not bad, could be better.

text:
We arrived at the Surabaya airport after flying with Air Asia.  There are 2 semi official taxi booths just outside of the exit and I was charged R90,000 (US$10/-) to goto the hotel, the good thing is they knew exactly which hotel I meant.  The trip took around 40min to the hotel, traffic is pretty bad in Surabaya (Not India bad, just busy)

The name Town Square Suites is a bit misleading as the Hotel is not in the heart of the city but a new commercial area called “Town Square” this is not a bad thing.  

The hotel lobby apart from being rather small and dark was pleasant and the reception I had upon arrival was prompt and courteous.  Getting the room organized was very quick and I would say that in under 3 minutes of entering I was on my way to the room.  

I was staying there with my Dad this time so I had a twin room.  The first thing that strikes you is the large bathtub, it almost seems a little out of place as the bathroom is also enlarged to suit.  It is quaint though and something you remember.  The bathroom also becomes the closet room with a safe in it.  
The rest of the room includes a flat screen TV, desk and 2 beds.  The hotel is new so everything is modern, comfortable and at this time working correctly.  Another nice addition is the complimentary bar fridge with comes with a few soft drinks and you get a pack of chips and nuts.

One of the main attractions I would say is that the hotel is part of a large commercial development called Town Square, the commercial side is a large number of restaurants, chemist, supermarket etc.. Basically you’re next door to an integrated shopping mall.  This makes up for the lack of food choices in the hotel.  We ended up at a restaurant called Savory which was pretty good and cheap.  

The bad side of having this next door is that the hotel restaurant that serves breakfast is very plain as they are not overly busy any other time.  The selection was limited, some of the supposedly hot food was cold & you need to raid the cereal milk dispenser to have some with your coffee otherwise you have to use powder creamer which for a 4 star hotel is really not on.  Anyone who reads my reviews knows I’m a big fan for the breakfast omelet and at TS this was very plain and rather tasteless.  I didn’t see any other alternatives in the TS area for breakfast.  

Sleeping time was ok, the beds were maybe a tad too soft but nothing really to whine about and I had no problem sleeping, there was no noise in the room either which was pleasant.  
No pictures this time, I didn’t stay very long here but I would have no problem coming back as the only real downside was breakfast but the positives of a new hotel coupled with the great choice of restaurants makes up for it.
title: Nice Hotel, Great For Food Choices

text:
TS Suites Hotel is a luxury hotel.
It is located in the central of Surabaya, it does not have a swimming pool but it does have a large bath tub =). I stayed on the 10th floor. 
It does have a gym but not that complete. I didn't eat the breakfast so not sure about their quality.
The Positives:
1. The service was superb, very well mannered staff, speaks good English and very caring to its customers.
2. Location is in the middle of the city core so it is good for business man
3. Huge room & bath room
4. Free wi-fi & lan
5. Provide good place to work, simply look like a neat office.
6. Free food and beverages
7. Very clean
The Negatives:
1. Expensive but worth it
2. The room was very big the bed was also big but somehow I am having an issue with sleeping.
3. Noise from Sutos still can be heard but not very bad from the top floor.

The mall itself is a hangout place for youngsters. You will see a lot of them and most of them are fashionable. It is more like a place to eat for me.

text:
We have been there for one night only during a business trip around java and teh hotel is really brillant in design, comfortable and very clean, which is very essential! Stuff is friendly and very helpful, we got a welcome juice drink during check in.
There is no restaurant inside the hotel but as it is connected directly to a big mall incl. shops and an enourmous variety of restaurant of each and every style it is not an issue at all. you get some vouchers for apprx. 15-20 restaurants with discount for dinner.
Breakfast is served at the lobby floor at a small fish restaurant but the most variety is for asian/indonesian breakfast only, the continental breakfast choice is a bit limited: toast, very sweet nectar juice, few fruit, just cornflakes, peanuts and raisin and chunks of baked banana and strawberry joghurt. Slept really well, only the air con is noisy even at the lowest stage. Would definitely choose this hotel again.
title: Comfortable and nice designed town hotel!

text:
L'hôtel est plutôt bien placé, en plein centre de Surabaya. Accès facile.

Les chambres sont spacieuses, et avec une magnifique vue sur la ville si on a la chance d'être dans les étages du haut.

Mais ce n'est pas qu'un hôtel : au rez de chaussée un mall avec des dizaines de restaurants et quelques petites boutiques. C'est l'idéal quand on rentre le soir pour aller manger un truc sans devoir ressortir et prendre un taxi. 

Le petit déjeuner de l'hôtel se prends au restaurant de l'hôtel qui se trouve lui aussi dans ce mall. Pas d'heure limite pour prendre le petit déjeuner, vous pourrez donc faire la grasse mat occasionnellement.
Le petit déjeuner est complet avec de nombreux plats différents. Il y en a pour tous les goûts.

L'accueil est lui aussi très agréable. Bref, parfait !
title: Excellent hôtel

text:
Ci ho passato tre settimane, niente da recriminare sul servizio. Personale estremamente cortese e pronto a soddisfare ogni esigenza del cliente. La posizione dell'hotel è invidiabile in quanto si trova presso un centro commerciale gremito di negozi e ristoranti.
Se tornerò a Surabaya soggiornerò sicuramente ancora lì
title: Bell'hotel

text: 我是在台灣經過Agoda訂房.因為本身喜歡攝影所以訂購了最高樓層15樓.封閉的玻璃.連開啟一點通風都不行.還有整動大樓全面禁煙.一樓設有吸菸會客室.酒店設施在泗水來說算是等級相當高.拍完火山後.選這家酒店休息.由於整體感覺不錯.我在這家飯店住了三晚.下次去泗水我還是會選擇這家.
title: 酒店位置好.樓下是大賣場.吃喝玩樂急於一身.去泗水旅遊好住處.

photos.caption: Minimalist design of the room ... very comfortable

text:
Die Lage ist sehr gut, nebenan im Townsquare gibt es viele Restaurants, Cafes, Shops und einen gutausgestatteten Supermarkt.
Zimmer sind gross, gut ausgestattet. Minibar inclusive im Zimmerpreis.
Nebenan ist ein GoldGym, als Hotelgast kann man das Gym kostenlos nutzen. Das Gym ist super ausgestattet, es fehlt an nichts!
Einziger Minuspunkt könnte sein, das die Zimmer auf Seite des "Townsquares" am Wochenende durch Veranstaltungen etwas lauter sein können.
title: Toll

text:
Aufgrund der sehr guten Bewertungen und der modernen Zimmer haben wir uns für das Hotel entschieden. Die Beschreibungen im Tripadvisor sind absolut zutreffend, nur sollte man einfach bedenken, dass es sich hier um ein Businesshotel handelt. D.h. so gut wie keine Touristen und die Rezeption ist mit Anfragen hinsichtlich Aktivitäten auch etwas überfordert. Kein Pool! Angrenzend an eine Food Mall, was sehr angenehm ist, denn es gibt genügend Auswahl zum Essen :-) Die Zimmer sind modern, sauber und wir hatten wirkliche einen sensationellen Blick.
Wenn ich mich allerdings als Tourist noch mal entscheiden müsste, würde ich für den gleichen Preis im Majapahit einchecken. Wir waren dort und haben es uns angeschaut und auch eine Massage genossen. Es ist einfach ein Urlaubshotel!
title: Businesshotel

text: Hotel aconchegante e moderno. Faltou piscina no calor da Indonésia.Localizado no SUTOS( Surabaya Towns Square), o lugar oferece várias opções de restaurantes, bares, farmácia e supermercado. Boa opção para quem não conhece muito bem a cidade.
title: Padrão Satisfatório

text: Die Zimmer sind neu, groß und sehr sauber. Moderne Einrichtung mit offenem Bad, das sich aber verschließen lässt. Das Hotel ist Teil eines Shopping- und Restaurantkomplexes, wo man einen gut sortierten Supermarkt findet, aber auch abends in einem der vielen Restaurants sehr gut sitzen und essen kann. Sehr hilfsbereites und aufmerksames Frontdesk!
title: Gern wieder

text: Die Hotelzimmer sind neu und sehr sauber. das Bad ist wie in vielen indonesischen Hotels offen gestaltet , lässt sich aber auch komplett verschließen, sodass die Privatsphäre gewährt bleibt. Das Hotel liegt direkt über einer Food Mall mit Aussenbereich, wo man Abends sehr schön sitzen kann. Gerne wieder!
title: Super Preis-Leistungsverhältnis

text: できてからまだ数年、ということもあって、新しくてきれいです。従業員の人も親切で、隣接しているモールも便利。エレベーターの操作にはカードキーが必要なので、安心感があります。ただ、おしゃれな内装には、逆に使いづらい、落ち着かない部分もあり。お値段考えると、朝食ビュッフェがもっと充実していてもよかったかも。
title: 清潔、便利、でもちょっと落ち着かない？
